Hasan works hard on improving his transportation business to stay loyal to his clients and fulfill their needs. He hopes to buy all the agricultural machines that will help to expand his work.

loan.use: to buy tools needed for his tractor.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy farm supplies and seeds

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy agricultural supplies (fertilizers, seeds).

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy agricultural inputs and seeds.

loan.name: Adiza

texts.fr: Revendeuse de crales depuis 1998, Mme Adiza est mre de 02 enfants et son conjoint est gendarme. Elle achte ses crales Ani et revend Ago Assiyy. Ce troisime prt lui servira acheter des crales pour revendre toute personne et assurer un avenir ses enfants.
texts.en: A retailer of cereals since 1998, Madam Adiza is the mother of two children and the wife of a policeman. She buys her grains in Ani and resells them in Ago Assiyy. This third loan will allow her to purchase cereals for resale and to ensure a future for her children.

loan.use: to purchase cereals.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to pay labor costs and to purchase agricultural inputs and seeds.

loan.name: Kodzovi

texts.fr: Mr Kodzovi est mari une couturire et ils ont 02 enfants en charge. Il tait menuisier de profession vu que son activit ne prospre pas comme il le souhaite, il a dmarr en 2008 par diffuser des films et matchs dans un claie amnag pour la circonstance toutes personnes qui nont pas la possibilit davoir un abonnement la maison.
texts.en: Mr Kodzovi is married to a seamstress and they have two children. He was a carpenter but as his commerce was not prospering as well as he wished, in 2008 he started a business showing films and sports in a shelter fitted out for the occasion for people who are not able to have a subscription at home.

loan.use: Purchase televisions and tables for fitting out the hall of the mini cinema.

loan.name: Marie

texts.fr: Marie est une femme ge de 46 ans. Elle est marie un mcanicien. Ils ont 5 enfants. Marie a travaill comme revendeuse depuis 2000. Elle vend des ignames frites (un tubercule sucr trs apprci au Togo) pour toutes personnes la devanture de la maison aprs avoir achet au march dAgo. Marie a requis son troisime crdit de WAGES afin dacheter digname, dhuile, spaghetti et divers pour la restauration. Elle veut satisfaire la demande croissante, assurer un avenir meilleur ses enfants et participer la charge de la famille.
texts.en: Marie is a 46 year old woman. She is married to a mechanic and they have 5 children. Marie has been working as a retailer since 2000.She sells fried yams (a sweet tuber much appreciated in Togo) to anyone in front of her home having purchased them at the market in Ago. Marie has requested her third loan from Wages in order to purchase yams, oil, spaghetti and various products for catering. She wants to satisfy the growing demand, provide a better future for her children, and contribute to the family expenses.

loan.use: Purchase yams

loan.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan, 39, is married and the father of six children. He has been working in construction for 20 years. He's an expert in his field and is recommended by most of his clients. Well known in the region, his work is special and updated with every new technology he learns of.
Hasan is requesting his first loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy wood pillars needed for his business. His family recommended Al Majmoua to him and he hopes that this step will have a positive impact on his business and social situation. His long experience gives him a special place in the construction field and helps in providing a good education for his children.

loan.use: to buy wood pillars needed for his business.

loan.name: Oumran

texts.en:
Oumran, 25, is a single man who has been working in tile polishing for eight years. He also transports water, in addition to driving agricultural transport.
Oumran has been an Al Majmoua-Kiva partner for three cycles. He is in good standing as a borrower, a hard worker and a man with a good reputation. In order to keep up his work, Oumran has requested a loan from Al Majmoua to buy the necessary tools and hardware for his tile polishing machine. This hardware will help improve his quality of work in a short period of time. Oumran is also seeking to finish pasting tiles and installing aluminum windows in his own house, which he is currently building to be his home. He needs to expand his business tools in order to cover more project requests.

loan.use: to buy the necessary tools and hardware for his tile polishing machine.

loan.name: Basoka Kwavula Development Group

texts.en:
Jackson is a 40-year-old ambitious businessman who relies on a food-sales business to provide for his family of 6. Jackson is happily married and he says his wife invariably helps him out at the food-market stall in Kayunga where he sells food. He has 3 years experience in running this business, where he principally sells bananas.
Bananas are a staple food in most parts of Uganda and a seller cannot go wrong with sufficient reserves. In Jackson's case, farming has helped a lot. The fact that he is able to harvest bananas from his own gardens to sell has been pivotal. Jackson also sells cattle. He says his weekly sales profits are about 180,000 Ugandan shillings. With this Kiva loan, he says he is going to purchase high-grade manure for his banana farm.

loan.use: To purchase high-grade manure for his banana farm

loan.name: Ziyad

texts.en:
Ziyad is a 36-year-old married man and the father of one child. He has worked as a butcher for 17 years. He's a man with a good reputation who works hard to improve his service to his customers and to meet their needs.
Ziyad is well known in the region because, compared to others, his shop is clean, his prices are affordable and his meat is tasty, as his clients say. He is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua for his sixth loan, in order to buy sheep, raise them and then sell their meat. He likes to do this because, as he says, he takes good care of the sheep to give him the tastiest meat to serve.
He's a borrower in good standing with Al Majmoua, and hopes to remain with the program. He hopes to expand his business and cover all of his family's expenses.

loan.use: To buy sheep to raise and then sell their meat

loan.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is 30 years old and married. He started a business three years ago selling various goods such as clothes, biscuits, sugar, lotion, soap, etc. Joseph works from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day.
Joseph has requested his first loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy the above-mentioned goods to sell. He will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in his business and to buy a motorcycle to help him.

loan.use: To purchase various goods such as clothes, biscuits, sugar, lotion, soap, etc. to sell

loan.name: Kalagala Prosperity For All Group

texts.en:
Edisa, who is 43 years old, has been overseeing her fresh fruit and vegetable sales enterprise for the last decade in Kayunga. Edisa is happily married with 4 children. She is one determined and tenacious lady, bent on seeing her business succeed against all odds in her maiden business undertaking.
Edisa sells mostly fresh fruit and vegetables from her farming garden. She says this business generates her weekly sales profits of about 37,000 shillings. With this loan, she says she is going to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell.

loan.use: to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell

payment.comment: Over-reported by partner. Reduced to local price.

loan.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 36 years old and married with five children. He has 3 years experience in his business selling various products such as Irish potatoes, beans, etc. His business is well-organized and is open from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. during the week. He currently employs 3 people to help him.
Charles has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more products such as Irish potatoes, beans, etc. to sell. He will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in his business and to pay school fees for his children.

loan.use: To purchase more products such as Irish potatoes, beans, etc. to sell

loan.name: C 7967 Abatarutinya Group

texts.en:
Charlotte is 30 years old and married, with five children aged between 4 and 11 years old. She sells rice from her field and her business is well known and well organized. Business hours are from 7 a.m. until 1 p.m. on weekdays. Charlotte is the leader of this group called "ABATARUTINYA". She is the second person on the right in the first row, wearing a white t-shirt.
Charlotte has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to increase her business by purchasing more rice to cultivate. She will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business, to save for the future and to pay her children`s school fees.

loan.use: To expand her business by purchasing more rice to cultivate.

loan.name: Odzi Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 55 year old Gloria (holding the yellow file) from Masvingo. She is widowed with four children with one attending school.
Gloria runs a retail business selling clothing as well as poultry. The business has been in operation for 10 years and employs one person. She says the main challenges are the defaulting of debtors. Gloria has requested a loan of $400 to increase stock. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to improve the general welfare of her family. In the future Gloria plans to operate an outlet as she has been eyeing this for some time now.

loan.use: to increase stock

loan.name: C 7910 Abajyamugambi Group

texts.en:
Merciane is 43 years old and married, with five children aged between 6 and 16 years old. She is the representative of a group called "ABAJYAMUGAMBI " in the local language. In the photo, Merciane is the first person on the right.
Merciane has operated a business cultivating rice for 2 years. Her business is well organized and its hours of operation are from 7 a.m. until 2 p.m. on weekdays.
Merciane has requested a loan from Kiva lenders in order to purchase more rice to cultivate. She will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business and to pay school fees for her children.

loan.use: To purchase more rice to cultivate in her field.

loan.name: Anonymous

texts.en:
This Kiva borrower is a 29-year-old single man from Lebanon. He lives with his parents and two siblings. He has been working as a freelance electrician for more than 10 years, sticking with multiple electric projects. He also works as a plumber serving customers upon their request.
In Lebanon, it is common at all levels of society for people to have multiple businesses to be able to cover the increasing costs of food, housing, and other family expenses. Today, this borrower is requesting to borrow $1000 from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase an air compressor and new tools needed. He feels positive about his business future and looks forward to working on bigger projects.

loan.use: to purchase an air compressor and new tools needed.

loan.name: Felicien

texts.en:
Felicien is 38 years old and married. He has two years experience in his business selling various goods such as lotion, soap, biscuits, candles, etc. His business is well-organized and he currently employs one person to help him. The hours of his business are from 7 a.m. to 6 p.m. every day of the week.
Felicien has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more of the above mentioned goods to sell. He will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in his business and save for his future.

loan.use: To purchase various goods such as lotion, soap, biscuits, candles, etc. to sell.

loan.name: Mukuvisi Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Zimbabwe! This is 43 year old Febi (holding the yellow file) from Masvingo. She is widowed with three children, one attending school. She also cares for four dependents.
Febi runs a retail business selling clothes and firewood at a fixed location and from door to door. The business has been in operation for 9 years. She says the main challenges she faces are competition from other suppliers. Febi has requested a loan of $400 to purchase more clothes and firewood. She says the extra income generated as a result of this loan will allow her to send her children to school and equip them with the right food and clothing. In the future Febi plans to operate a shop employing workers.

loan.use: to purchase stock of firewood and clothes

loan.name: Ntenjeru Tubeere Group

texts.en:
Zebhor is a cheerful father of 4 who says hard work has taken his food sales business out of its stagnation. In his farms in Kayunga from where he gets most of the crops he sells, he plants crops such as bananas, coffee, beans, maize and coffee. He says it is mostly coffee he sells because it is a high selling crop in the food markets in and around Kayunga and in better food markets in Kampala.
From his own account he has done great business selling coffee. It is on that basis that he wants to grow more coffee as the potential for even greater profits in the future. His experience in this business for the last 5 years shows that nothing short of diligence, determination and optimism will bring business success. Zebhor has been making common cause with Pearl Micro-finance for quite a long time. He says it's where he prefers to apply and get loans from.
Weekly he says this business generates him 150,000 Shillings as sales profits. He reckons he will be able to earn an even greater amount when he gets this Kiva loan. He anticipates this loan will be one of his means to achieve this end. He is planning on purchasing more coffee seedlings to plant and dry coffee to sell

loan.use: The purchase pf coffee seedlings and dry coffee to sell

loan.name: Orit

texts.en:
Orit is a 41-year-old mother who lives in Hod Hasharon. She and her family moved to Israel at the end of 2010. Orit has an extensive background and training in yoga instruction and decided to open a private studio for both individual and group lessons. For the last several months she has been building up a clientele base. While Orit has the experience, charisma, charm and potential to manage a successful and much sought after studio, she was lacking basic materials for the studio and its marketing.
Orit needed this loan to purchase yoga mats & accessories, furniture for her studio, and for the creation & design of her business website.
Orit wants to see her business develop and become a successful enterprise. In the future she hopes the studio will expand and she can hire other instructors to provide lessons throughout the day for both groups and individuals.

loan.use: to purchase yoga mats & accessories, furniture for her studio, and for the creation & design of her business website.

loan.name: Marie Chantal

texts.en:
Marie Chantal is 33 years old and married, with five children aged between 3 and 11 years old. She has 8 years experience selling men's shoes. Her business is well-organized and she works from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day except Saturday. Marie Chantal currently employs two people to help her.
Marie Chantal has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more men's shoes to sell. She will use the profit generated from this loan to reinvest in her business and to save for her future.

loan.use: To purchase more men's shoes to sell.

loan.name: Guillermina

texts.es: La seora Guillermina es empleada en una joyera en la zona central y su esposo trabaja en el sindicato Simn Bolvar como chofer. El crdito lo requiere para el cambio de caja y la reparacin general de su movilidad, esto para la seguridad de sus pasajeros. Guillermina vive en casa propia, en la zona de Alpacota de la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene un hijo. Es primer crdito con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en: Guillermina works in a jewelers shop in the city center, and her husband works as a driver with the Simn Blivar union. The loan she is requesting will be used to change the gear box and to pay for general repairs of his vehicle, in order to grant security to his passengers. Guillermina lives in her own house in Alpacota, a neighborhood of the capital La Paz. She is married and she has a son. This is the first loan she has requested to IMPRO and KIVA..

loan.use: To change teh gear box and to pay for general repairs on her husband's public transportation vehicle.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy an engine for his taxi.

loan.name: Carlos

texts.es: El seor Carlos trabaja como chofer con el taxi de su propiedad; el crdito lo requiere para la cancelacin de tramites de transferencia del vehiculo. Vive en casa propia, la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz; es divorciado, tiene tres hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crdito en IMPRO.
texts.en: Carlos is a cab driver and he drives his own taxi. The loan he is requesting will be used to repay the transfer expenses of the vehicle. He lives in his own house in Achachicala, a neighborhood of the capital La Paz. He is divorced and has three children. This is the first time he is requesting a loan through IMPRO.

loan.use: To repay the transfer expenses of the taxi.

loan.name: Simon

texts.es: El seor Simn es empleado, trabaja en una empresa al igual que su esposa. El crdito lo requiere para la compra de un auto que le ayudaran mucho para desplazarse a su fuente de trabajo sin problemas ya que viven en un lugar muy alejado. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz; Simon es casado y tiene dos hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los crditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente y tiene un excelente historial de pagos.
texts.en: Simn is an office worker; he and his wife work for the same company. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy a car, which will help them easily reach his place of work as they live quite far away from it. He lives in his parents house in Achachicala, a neighborhood of the capital La Paz. Simn is married and has two children. This borrower is very satisfied with the loan he has previously been granted, and his repayment history is excellent.

loan.use: To buy a vehicle to reach is place of work.

loan.name: Veronica

texts.es: La seora Vernica es empleada de una oficina desempeando las funciones de secretaria. El crdito lo requiere para la cancelacin de los trmites de la carrera que estudia. Vive en casa de su esposo, ubicada en la zona de Alto Pura Pura de la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crdito en IMPRO.
texts.en: Vernica works as a secretary in an office. She needs a loan for administrative fees and expenses at her university. Vernica is married and has two children; she lives with her husband in the Alto Pura Pura zone of La Paz city. This is her first loan from IMPRO.

loan.use: To pay administrative fees required to obtain her university degree.

loan.name: Emiliana

texts.es: La seora Emiliana se dedica a la venta de comida como ser: almuerzos y platos extras. El crdito lo requiere para compra de insumos (papa, arroz, carne, condimentos, etc.) as aumentara su capital de trabajo. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz; es casada y tiene dos hijos. La cliente se encuentra muy satisfecha con los crditos que se le otorgaron pudo ampliar su negocio lo que implica el aumento de clientela. Esta es la quinta vez que solicita un crdito de Impro y la segunda con Kiva.
texts.en: Seora Emiliana's occupation is selling food, such as lunches and other dishes. The loan is required to purchase ingredients (potato, rice, meat, condiments, etc.) and to increase her working capital. She lives in her own house in the Alto San Pedro area of La Paz city, is married and has two children. The client is very satisfied with the loans granted to her, enabling her to expand her business which involves increasing the number of customers. This is the fifth time she is applying for credit with Impro and the second with Kiva.

loan.use: to purchase ingredients such as rice, meat, potatoes, noodles, etc., for her business preparing and selling food.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to purchase supplies for crops and buy more fruit merchandise.

loan.name: Milagros

texts.en:
Milagros is a hard-working mother who is now 56 years old. She has a grocery store where she sells noodles, junk foods, detergent soaps and canned goods. Milagros has operated this business for almost seven years.
Milagros is asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase additional grocery items, soft drinks, frozen foods and vegetables. She usually earns about PHP 8,000 each month in this business.
In the future, Milagros hopes to improve this kind of business in order to supplement her husband's income for the sake of their children and their future. She hopes that KIVA lenders will continuously support her in the business in order to achieve her goals in life.

loan.use: to purchase additional grocery items, soft drinks, frozen foods and vegetables

location.town: Brgy. Malasin, Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loan.name: Arle Javier

texts.es: Arle de 28 aos de edad, trabaja como asesor pedagogico del Ministerio de Educacin del el Almendro, es habitante de la zona # 1 de Nueva Guinea solicicita su 9no crdito para comprar materiales de construccin para construir su propia vivienda, se siente agradecido con nuestra institucin ya que atraves de un crdito otorgado por AFODENIC tiene su propio solar y poco a poco ir construyendo su propia vivienda, su esposa tambien se desempea como docente ambos se ayudan con todos los gastos , su mayor sueo en la vida es tener su propia vivienda y que su familia goze de salud.
texts.en:
Arle is 28 years old and works as a teaching assessor for the Ministry of Education in El Almendro. He resides in Zone #1 of Nueva Galicia.
Arle is requesting his 9th loan to buy construction materials to continue building his own house. He is very grateful to our institution since due to previous loans through AFODENIC, he has acquired his own lot and little by little, is constructing his own house.
Arle's wife is also a teacher. Both contribute to covering household expenses. His greatest dream in life is to have his own home and that his family enjoy good health.

loan.use: to buy materials for home construction.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy merchandise, mainly fruit, to sell.

loan.name: Eusebia

texts.es: Doa Eusebia de 49 aos de edad trabaja como docente desde hace 20 aos, solicita su 2do crdito para construir el bao de su vivienda y asi gozar de mejores condiciones junto a su humilde familia , su compaero de vida la ayuda con el pago de las cuotas ya que son bien unidos , su mayor sueo en la vida gozar de mucha salud para seguir trabajando y ayudar a su linda familia y poco a poco ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida
texts.en: Eusebia, 49, has been working as a Teacher for 20 years. She is asking for her second loan to build a bathroom in her house to enjoy better living conditions with her humble family. Her life partner helps her pay her loan installments because they are very united. Her greatest dream in life is to enjoy good health, to help her lovely family and gradually be improving her living conditions.

loan.use: to build a bathroom.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy meal preparation ingredients.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy fruit, vegetables and all kinds of meat.

loan.name: Yayanmarca Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal YAYANMARCA; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Urcos, perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Paulina; ella es conviviente y tiene 48 aos y tiene 5 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de crianza y venta de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia vende los animales menores en las distintas ferias que existe en el distrito de Urcos, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de crianza y venta de animales. La socia solicita el prstamo para comprar animales como cuyes y gallinas y tambin comprar alimentos para los animales.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de productos secos, compra y venta de ovejas, negocio de venta de telares, negocio de venta de comida y venta de verduras.
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueo mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the Yayanmarca communal bank which is located in Urcos District belonging to Quispicanchis Province, Cusco Department.
Paulina, 48, is the member. She has a spouse and five children. She works raising small farm animals, like guinea pigs and chickens, that she sells in the various farmers markets that exist in Urcos District. She works from 7am until 5pm and she raises her children through this business. She wants to expand the animal raising business and is asking for a loan to buy animals, like guinea pigs and chickens, as well as animal feed for them.
The other group members sell dry goods, are sheep merchants, textile merchants, food sellers and vegetable merchants.
The member thanks all those who are sharing her dream through this means and commits to repay her loan in a timely fashion.

loan.use: to buy animals like guinea pigs and chickens as well as animal feed.

loan.name: Reli Group

texts.en:
Khatibu, in his early 30's, is a married father of two children, one of whom goes to school. The operator of a tailoring business for five years now, he works from 6.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Khatibu's fifth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, his previous loans, all repaid, having been used to buy a sewing machine, renovate his shop and meet household expenses. He will use this loan to buy materials for the sewing business, and his dream is to one day expand his shop and employ people to sew.

Khatibu will share this loan with his loan group "Reli," which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loan.use: to buy materials for his sewing business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy farming supplies.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy more merchandise like DVDs and CDs, for example.

loan.name: Roger

texts.en:
Roger, a married man living in San Jose, Enrile, Cagayan is the father of six children. His spouse devotes herself full-time to taking care of their children.

Roger has been in the business of providing motorcycle transport services in the local community for five years, earning approximately PHP 4,000 monthly. He is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 from KIVA lenders through ASKI to purchase new tires and repair his current vehicle to ensure the safety of his passengers.

In the future, Roger would like to strengthen his business in order to better provide for his family.

loan.use: to purchase new tires and to repair his vehicle.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy farming supplies and animal feed.

loan.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 55 aos, esta no es la primera vez que solicita crditos ya que tiene mucho tiempo de ser cliente de Fundacin. Su actividad es la venta de carne, pues siempre est buscando la forma de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, todos los das llegan sus clientes a comprarles una gran variedad de carne. Lo que ella ofrece es lomo, pancho, hgado, posta y otros productos, es por eso que solicita este crdito para la compra de una gran variedad de carnes.
texts.en:
This isnt the first loan Mercedes, 55, has requested; shes been a client of the Fundacin for a long time.
Her activity is meat sales since shes always seeking ways to improve her and her familys quality of life. Customers come by daily to buy a large variety of meat. She stocks sirloin, brisket, liver, round steak and other meat products and this is why shes asking for a loan to buy a large variety of meats.

loan.use: to buy meat and meat byproducts.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy spare parts for her bicycle business.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy farming supplies.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy pig feed.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: purchase agricultural supplies.

loan.name: Bakolle Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit est cr le 19 octobre 2001. Il est compos de huit femmes qui habitent le mme quartier. Leur activit principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Amy qui est la droite de la photo vtue d'un boubou bleu est responsable de groupe. Elle est ge de 43 ans. Elle est marie et mre de huit enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge trois autre enfants confi par ses parents.
Elle sactive dans la vente de produits maraichres et de l'huile de palme.
Ce prt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux dvelopper ses activits.
Les profits lui permettront damliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (sant, nourriture, habillement etc.) et daugmenter ses pargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on October 19, 2001. It is composed of eight women living in the same neighborhood. Their main business activity is retail.
Mrs. Amy, on the right in the photo, dressed in a blue outfit, is the groups leader. She is 43 years old. She is married and the mother of eight. She also has three other children in her care, entrusted to her by relatives.
She sells garden produce and palm oil. This loan will allow her to bolster her working capital and better develop her business. Her income will allow her to improve the life conditions of her family (healthcare, food, clothing etc) and to grow her savings.

loan.use: to buy garden produce and palm oil

loan.name: Mylene

texts.en:
Mylene, a responsible 41-year-old housewife, has been engaged in selling cosmetics and apparel from AVON, Natasha and MSE within her village for almost five years. She usually earns about PHP 5,000 each month. Mylene is now requesting a loan of PHP 6,000 to purchase additional lipsticks, perfumes, lotions and powders to sell.

In the future, Mylene hopes to strengthen this enterprise in order to help her husband in gaining income for their family. She hopes that Kiva lenders will support them in this business to make her dreams come true.

loan.use: to purchase additional lipsticks, perfumes, lotions and powders to sell.

location.town: Brgy. Malasin Dupax del Norte, Nueva Vizcaya

loan.name: Bayerena Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit est cr le 19 octobre 2001. Le groupe est constitu de six femmes qui habitent le mme quartier. Leur activit principale est le petit commerce.
Madame Khady qui est la droite de la photo levant la main et le responsable de groupe. Elle est ge de 43 ans. Elle est marie et mre de six enfants. Elle a aussi en sa charge deux autre enfants confi par ses parents.
Elle fait un petit commerce de tomate et de bissab (feuilles oseille).
Ce prt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux dvelopper ses activits afin de gnrer plus de bnfice.
Son objectif est de participer l'amlioration des conditions de vie de la famille (sant, nourriture, habillement etc.) et daugmenter ses pargnes.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was formed on October 19, 2001. The group is made up of six women who live in the same district. Their main business involves selling small items.
Madame Khady who is on the right in the photo, raising her hand, is the leader of the group. She is 43, married, and the mother of six children. She is also raising two other children who were confided to her by relatives.
She has a little business selling tomatoes and hibiscus petals. This loan will allow her to bolster her capital and expand her business so as to earn more income. Her goal is to participate in improving family living conditions (health, food, clothing, etc.) and adding to her savings.

loan.use: to buy tomatoes and dried hibiscus flowers.

loan.name: Augusto Cesar

texts.es: Augusto Cesar siempre ha sido una persona luchadora, pues siempre est disfrutando de proporcionar a su cliente los ingresos necesarios. Su negocio es la venta de ropa, desde hace ms de 8 aos que tiene este negocio, ha salido adelante por medio de duro trabajo y dedicacin. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, vestidos y camisas para vestir. Es as que podr permitirle a sus clientes brindarles una gran variedad de productos.
texts.en:
Augusto Cesar has always been a tenacious person. He always enjoys supplying his customers and getting the income he needs.
His business is selling clothes. He has had this business for over eight years. He has gotten ahead through his hard work and dedication.
The loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses. That way he will be able to offer his customers a great variety of products.

loan.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy supplies for his crops.

loan.name: Dioko Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarit DIOKO a t cr le 14 mai 2010.Il est compos de 13 membres qui sont issus de la mme localit. Elles ont pour activit principale le petit commerce.
Madame Mame Aminata lextrme droite est responsable du groupement,elle est marie et s'occupe de 09 enfants qui ne sont pas les siens.
Sa principale activit est la vente de glaces;de jus de fruits.
Son prt lui permettra d'acheter des chaussures et des bijoux qu'elle va revendre.
Son objectif est de renforcer sa capacit d'pargne,aussi la nourriture et la sant des enfants dont elle a la charge.
texts.en:
The solidarity group called DIOKO was formed on May 14, 2010. It is composed of 13 members who all come from the same locality. Their principal activity involves selling small items.
Ms. Mame Aminata, on the far right, is the leader of the group. She is married and raising nine children, none of whom are her biological children. Her main business is selling ice-creams and fruit juice. Her loan will allow her to buy shoes and costume jewelry for resale.
Her goal is to be able to save more, as well as supporting the children she is raising, providing for food and health concerns.

loan.use: to buy shoes and costume jewelry for resale.

loan.name: Saint Christophe Group

texts.fr:
ce groupement a t cr le 14 mai 2010.il est compos de 23 membres issus de la mme commune. Leur activit principale est le commerce de larachide.
La femme qui est en position debout avec le bras lev est responsable du groupement, elle est ge de 38 ans et n'a aucun enfant en charge.
Sa principale activit est la transformation de l'arachide en pte.
Son prt lui permettra d'acheter des arachides pour les transformer en pte en vue de les revendre.
Son objectif est de disposer d'une bonne pargne.
texts.en:
This group was created on May 14, 2010. It is composed of 23 members who all come from the same township. Their primary activity is buying and selling peanuts.
The woman standing and raising her hand is the leader of the group. She is 38 and is not raising any children. Her main business is making peanuts into peanut butter. Her loan will allow her to buy peanuts to make into peanut butter and then sell.
Her goal is to put aside a lot in savings.

loan.use: to buy peanuts to use to make peanut butter.

loan.name: Balcon Florido Group

texts.es: La Alcanca Comunal Balcn Florido cuenta con 8 integrantes. Clinda es la Presidenta del grupo, se dedica a la elaboracin y venta D. queso D. forma artesanal. La comunidad en donD. residen los integrantes D. esta Alcanca Comunal es alejada y al menos 3 horas D. viaje en carretera sin pavimentacin, por lo cual a lo mas 2 veces a la semana sacan sus productos a la provincia. Clinda junto a sus socios se dedican a la ganadera desD. hace 20aos. Su dedicacin y esfuerzo le ha permitido adquirir un terreno y actualmente lo esta pagando con su trabajo. El dinero del prstamo ser invertido en la compra D. insumos como: sal, cuajo (pastillas para cuajar el queso) y moldes para la fabricacin del queso, adems Clinda adquirir Alimento balanceado para sus vacas. Clinda esta entusiasmada pues por festividades en su pueblo le permitir aumentar sus ventas. La Alcanca Comunal Balcn Florido es leal al programa y agradecen la nueva oportunidad D. financiar su trabajo
texts.en:
The communal bank "Balcn Florido" has 8 members. Clinda is the President of the group, she is engaged in the manufacture and sale of artisanal cheese. The community where the members of this communal bank live is remote and at least 3 hours trip by unpaved road to the province, so they take their products there at most twice a week. Clinda, together with her partners, has been engaged in raising cattle for 20 years. Her dedication and hard work has allowed her to acquire some land and it is now paying off with her work.
The loan money will be invested in the purchase of supplies such as salt, rennet (tablets for curdling cheese) and molds for the manufacture of cheese, additionally Clinda will acquire balanced feed for her cows. Clinda is excited because festivities in her village will allow her to increase her sales. The communal bank "Balcn Florido" is loyal to the program and welcome the new opportunity to finance their work.

loan.use: to buy salt, rennet tablets for making cheese, and balanced food for the cows

loan.name: Sope Serigne Babacar Sy Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement sope serigne babacar sy a t cr le 14 mai 2010.IL est compos de 18 membres issus de la meme commune.
Madame Aida debout lextrme droite de la photo est responsable du groupement.Elle est ge de 41 ans ,elle est marie et mre de 05 enfants.
sa principale activit est le commerce de tissus et de parfums.D'ailleurs elle dispose d'une bonne exprience de cette activit pour l'avoir pratiqu un peu plus d'un an.
Son prt lui permettra d'acheter des tissus,du parfum et de la pte qu'elle va revendre.
Son objectif est d'assurer la scolarit de ses enfants.
texts.en:
The group Sope Serigne Babacar Sy was created on May 14, 2010. It is composed of 18 members who all come from the same township.
Madame Aida, standing on the far right in the photo, is the group leader. She is 41, married, and the mother of five children.
Her main business is selling lengths of cloth and perfumes. In fact, she has good experience as she has been in this business for a little more than one year. Her loan will permit her to buy cloth, perfumes and peanut butter for resale.
Her goal is to ensure that she can pay for her children's education.

loan.use: to buy cloth, perfume, and peanut butter.

loan.name: Xalafal Group

texts.fr:
Le groupement XALAFAL a t cr le 08 mai 2010.Il est compos de 22 femmes issues du meme village.Elles ont pour principale activ le petit commerce du sucre.
Madame Wanegu droite, en position debout;le bras lev est responsable du groupement,elle est ge de 59 ans,elle est marie et mre de 03 enfants et s'occupe galement de 05 autres enfants dont elle a la garde.
Elle a pour activit le petit commerce du sucre et de l'huile;elle dispose d'une bonne exprience de cette activit pour l'avoir pratiquer pendant 02 ans.
Son prt lui permettra d'acheter du btail pour faire de l'levage,et aussi acheter du sucre et de l'huile en vue de les revendre.
Son objectif est d'aider son mari en l'appuyant dans les charges du mnage: scolarit des enfants;la dpense quotidienne de la maison.
texts.en:
The Darou Fall group was created on May 8, 2010. It is composed of 22 women who come from the same village. Their main activity is buying and selling sugar.
Madame Wanegu, on the right, standing with her hand raised, is the leader of the group. She is 59, married, and the mother of three children. She also cares for five other children for whom she is responsible.
Her main activity is buying and selling sugar and oil. She has good experience since she has been in this business for two years.
Her loan will allow her to buy livestock to raise, as well as buying sugar and oil for resale. Her goal is to help her husband cover family expenses such as the children's school fees and daily household expenditures.

loan.use: to buy livestock, oil, and sugar.

loan.name: Gorgorlu Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe GORGORLU a t cr le 17 Mai 2011 lors de linauguration leur banc villageois. Il compte 25 femmes qui habitent toutes le mme village. Elles font toutes le petit commerce.
Madame Adama au milieu du groupe, levant la main, est responsable. Elle est ge de 45 ans, est marie et mre de cinq enfants. Elle a en charge un neveu et deux belles filles.
Elle vend du th quelle achte au march hebdomadaire de sa localit. Activit quelle exerce de puis plus de cinq.
Son prt va lui permettre de mieux sapprovisionner en th.
Les bnfices lui serviront daugmenter son capital, et de soutenir son mari dans de la scolarit des enfants.
texts.en:
The group called Gorgorlu was created on May 17, 2011 at the time of the inauguration of their "Banc Villageois". It numbers 25 women who all live in the same village. They all buy and sell small items.
Madame Adama, in the center of the group, raising her hand, is the leader. She is 45, married, and the mother of five children. She also supports one nephew and two daughters-in-law. She sells tea which she buys at the weekly market in her area. She has been in this business for more than five (years).
Her loan will allow her to stock up on tea. The profit will allow her to increase her working capital and help her husband to pay school fees for their children.

loan.use: to stock up on tea.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy supplies for crops

loan.name: Jokker Endem Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe Joker Endam a t cr le 17 Mai 2011 lors de linauguration leur banc villageois. Il compte 25 femmes qui habitent toutes le mme village. Elles font toutes le petit commerce.
Madame Aminata (assise un peu gauche du groupe et levant la main) est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge de 20 ans, marie et mre dun enfant.
Elle vend de larachide en dtail. Elle pratique cette activit depuis plus dune anne.
Son crdit va lui permettre dacheter de larachide pour la revente.
Avec les bnfices elle compte appuyer son mari dans les charges domestiques.
texts.en:
The Joker Endam group was created on May 17, 2011, at the same time as their "Banc villageois" was inaugurated. It comprises 25 women, who all live in the same village. They are all retailers.
Mrs. Aminata, who is sitting towards the left of the group with her hand raised, is the group's leader. She is 20 years old, married, and a mother of one.
She retails ground nuts. She has been in this business for over a year.
Her loan will allow her to purchase ground nuts to resell.
With the profit, she intends to assist her husband with domestic expenditures.

loan.use: to purchase ground nuts for resale.

loan.name: Las Hormiguitas Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Las Hormiguitas ya tiene 2 aos D. funcionamiento y est conformado por 9 personas que son trabajadores y emprendedores que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta das en la ciudad del Cusco. La mayora D. los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco.
En esta reunin conocimos a la seora Paulina que vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco y tiene ocho hijos pero que todos ya son independientes. DesD. joven se caracterizo por ser una persona responsable, amable y trabajadora y por ese motivo sus vecinas le invitaron a participar en el banco comunal. Paulina se dedica a la venta D. mermeladas D. diferentes frutas naturales, ella misma los prepara en su domicilio y los envasa en recipientes D. buena calidad. Ella en esta oportunidad requiere el prstamo para comprar ms insumos como por ejemplo azcar, miel, frutas frescas y otras cosas ms. Ella tiene 73 aos D. edad, es una persona con muchas ganas D. superarse y tener un negocio exitoso da con da, siempre con el deseo D. brindarle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
The communal bank Las Hormiguitas ("The Ants") has been operating for 2 years and is comprised of 9 people. They are workers and entrepreneurs who at every moment seek the opportunity to succeed and through their daily efforts to proviD. a better future for their children. The meetings of the communal bank take place every thirty days in the city of Cusco. Most members live in the city of Cusco.
At this meeting we met Seora Paulina who lives in the beautiful city of Cusco and has eight children, but all of them are independent. Since her youth, she has been known for being a responsible person, kind and hardworking, and that is why her neighbors invited her to participate in the communal bank. Paulina is dedicated to the sale of various natural fruit jams, she prepares them in her home and packages them in good quality containers. At this time she is requesting a loan to buy more ingredients such as sugar, honey, fresh fruit and other additional items. She is 73 years old, and is a person eager to excel and have a successful business every day, always with the desire to proviD. the best to her family.

loan.use: to buy more ingredients for making jam, for example sugar, honey and fresh fruit.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: buy agricultural supplies.

loan.name: Saranga Group

texts.en:
Dainess, a single woman in her mid 20's, is the mother of a very small child. She also takes care of her young sister who is still in school. Dainess has been running a beauty salon for two years now, and is able to make a good monthly profit working from 8.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. daily.

This will be Dainess's sixth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, her previous loans, all since repaid, having been used to pay for her sister's school fees and salon equipment. She now hopes for a loan to buy yet more salon equipment. Her dream is to one day become a designer.

She will share this loan with her group "Saranga," which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loan.use: to buy more salon equipment.

loan.name: "unidos Al Futuro" Group

texts.es: Unidos al futuro es una Alcanca Comunal con 8 integrantes. Sabina es una mujer D. 53 aos, casada, tiene 2 hijos mayores. Hace 5 aos tiene una tienda en donD. venD. abarrotes y productos D. primera necesidad, su deseo junto a su esposo es que esta tienda mejore en su stock D. productos y as tener mayores ganancias para ayudar a sus hijos adems construir y mejorar su vivienda. Sabina invertir en la compra D. aceite, leche, arroz y azcar para ofrecer en su tienda. Sabina junto a sus socios son personas con valores definidos y ser responsables les caracteriza. La Alcanca Comunal Unidos al futuro agradece la nueva oportunidad D. financiar sus actividades econmicas y trabajo.
texts.en:
Unidos al futuro [United for the Future] is a communal bank which has 8 members. Sabina is a 53 year old woman who is married and has 2 older children. She has had a store where she sells groceries and basic necessity products for 5 years. Her desire, along with her husband, is to improve their stock of products and thereby, increase their income to help their children as well as build and improve their home.
Sabina will invest in the purchase of oil, milk, rice and sugar to sell in her store. Sabina and her fellow members are responsible people with set values. The communal bank "Unidos al futuro" is grateful for the new opportunity to finance their work and economic activities.

loan.use: buy oil, rice and sugar to stock her store.

loan.name: G.s. Montes De Los Olivos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Montes De Los Olivos. Sofa tiene su negocio que es la venta de frijoles, desde hace ms de 4 aos que tiene este negocio, siempre le ha gustado ser una persona muy responsable y disfruta de su actividad al proporcionar a su familia los ingresos necesarios. Inicio con la idea de ayuda r a su esposo en la manutencin del hogar. Es por eso que realiza este crdito con el fin de invertir en la compra de 2 quintales de frijoles y proporcionarles a sus clientes lo que ellos le solicitan.
texts.en:
Montes De Los Olivos (Mount of Olives) communal bank.
Sofas business is selling beans. Shes had it for over four years. Shes always liked being a very responsible person and she enjoys being able to provide her family with needed income. She started out with the idea of helping her husband support the household. This is why shes asking for this loan to buy two quintals of beans to have for customers who request them.

loan.use: to buy two quintals of beans.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy farming supplies.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy farming supplies.

loan.name: Angela Cecilia

texts.es: ngela Cecilia tiene 30 aos, su actividad es la venta de productos lcteos. Desde hace mas de 2 aos que tiene este negocio, ella tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo de 10 y 8 aos respectivamente de quienes se encarga diariamente para prepararlos. Inicio cuando tena 6 vacas que haba obtenido por su Mama quien se las haba regalado, con mucho empeo y dedicacin ngela decide establecer su negocio de venta de productos lcteos en su vivienda al notar que era muy rentable decide comenzar esta actividad. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de vacas ya que actualmente no tiene.
texts.en:
ngela Cecilia is 30 years old. Her activity is selling dairy products. Shes had this business for over two years. She has two minor children in her care who are 10 and 8 years old respectively. She takes care of getting them ready every day.
She started when she had six cows that shed obtained from her mother who gave them to her. With much effort and dedication ngela decides to establish her business selling dairy products from home when she noticed that deciding to start this activity was very profitable. The reason for the loan is to buy cows because she currently doesnt have any.

loan.use: to buy cows.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy farming supplies.

loan.name: Alamouta Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe de solidarit est cr le 19 octobre 2001. Il est compos de femmes qui habitent le mme quartier. leur activit tourne au tour de la vente de l'huile de palme, de jus de citron, de petit djeuner et de patte d'arachide.
Madame Aissatou debout la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable du groupe. Elle est ge 52 ans. Elle est marie et mre de cinq enfants. Elle a aussi en charge quatre autres enfants qui lui sont confis par ses proches.
Elle s'active dans le commerce de poissons frais depuis plusieurs annes.
Ce prt lui permettra de renforcer son capital afin de mieux dvelopper son activit.
Les bnfices lui permettront aider son mari dans la prise en charge des frais de nourriture de la famille.
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on October 19, 2001. It is composed of women who live in the same neighborhood. Their businesses involve selling palm oil, lemon juice, breakfasts, and peanut butter.
Madame Aissatou, standing on the right in the photo and raising her hand, is the leader of the group. She is 52, married and the mother of five children. She is also raising four other children who were confided to her by those around her.
She has been selling fresh fish for several years. This loan will allow her to increase her capital so that she can expand her business. The profit will permit her to help her husband pay for food for the family.

loan.use: to buy fish.

loan.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco, tiene la edad de 36 aos, est casado y vive con sus 5 hijos y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crdito realizar la siembra del frijol y asistirlo en su etapa de crecimiento. El cuenta con el terreno apto para la explotacin de este cultivo en buenas condiciones. El quiere sembrar esa rea y poder asistirlo bastante para obtener posteriormente buenos resultados y as poder salir adelante con los pagos del prstamo y mejorar el nivel de vida de mi esposa e hijos. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Francisco is 36 years old, married and living with his five children and his wife who are his main priority in life. He intends to use the loan for his bean crop, to help it during the growing stage. He has a field in good condition that is apt for growing this particular crop. He wants to plant it and provide much care to obtain the best results later and be able to repay the loan and improve his wifes and his childrens standard of living.
This is the first loan hes gotten from FUDECOSUR. He hadnt had any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to tend to his bean crops.

loan.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa de 32 aos de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta conservicioslo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Tambogrande que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Esta zona se caracteriza por su actividad agricola, ganadera y artesana.
Rosa se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catlogo, negocio que se encuentra en su domicilio, pero que tambin lo ofrece de casa en casa a sus vecinos desde hace varios aos. Estos productos es para que las personas mejoren su imagen perosnal, tambin labora en una ONG que es otroingresoque recibe para cubrir las necesidades de su hogar.
Ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de productos y les pueda seguir ofertando a sus clientes y para inmobiliario para exibir sus productos. Con los ingresos de la venta de todos sus productos de belleza cubrira el prstamo brindado y mejorar su calidad de vida. Rosa es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, alegre y responsable con lanica idea de seguir superandose en la vida.
texts.en:
Rosa is 32 years old, single, and lives in her parents' home. The only service the house receives is electricity. It is located in the rural area of Tambogrande district, in Piura department. This area is noted for its farming, livestock raising and handicrafts.
Rosa sells beauty products through a catalog. Her business is located in her home but she has also been making sales door to door to her neighbors for several years. She sells products which help people to improve their personal image. Rosa also works for an NGO which is another source of income she has for covering her household needs.
Rosa has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa. She will use the money to buy a larger quantity of products that she will be able to continue offering to her customers. She will also buy furniture for displaying her products. With the income she makes from selling all her beauty products, Rosa will be able to repay her loan and improve her quality of life. Rosa is very well known as a hard-working, cheerful and responsible woman whose only goal is to continue doing well in life.

loan.use: to buy furniture and more beauty products to stock her business

loan.name: Gloria Narcisa

texts.es:
Gloria Narcisa tiene 42 aos, Es viuda vive sola, tiene tres hijos pero todos son casados, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Fras de Medelln, perteneciente al Cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Gloria se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz desde hace 25 aos adems se dedica a la crianza de animales de corral, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos, tambin para la alimentacin de los animales. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos es la competencia y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es dejar buena herencia a los hijos.
Le gusta salir a pasear y hacer deporte con la familia.
texts.en:
Gloria Narcisa is 42 years old. Shes a widow and lives alone. She has three children but they are all married. She lives in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The La Unin (Unity) communal bank is located in Aguas Fra de Medelln which belongs to Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.
Gloria has been farming corn for the last 25 years. She also raises small farm animals. Her purchases take place in Ventanas and her sales occur at daily farmers markets, especially Sundays.
She is asking for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure and also for animal feed. Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs. The challenges she faces are competition and weather variations.
Her dream is to leave a good inheritance for her children. She enjoys going out on trips and playing sports with her family.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure and also to feed the animals.

loan.name: Las Carmelitas Group

texts.es: La Seora Maritza es integrante del Grupo Comunal "Las carmelitas", La Sra. Maritza tiene 45 aos y vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos, ella empezo el negocio primero estudiando en una ONG al culminar sus estudios empezo a elaborar los dulces aprendidos en casa y los ofrecia a las vecinas. En la actualidad ella cuenta ya con sus clientes fijos a quienes les ofrece sobretodo los fines D. semana. Su meta es poder tener su propia pasteleria en donD. pueda ofrecer sus dulces. Su prestamo lo invertira en la compra D. insumos para la elaboracion D. sus pasteles.
texts.en: Mrs. Maritza lives in Nueva Jerusaln in Carabayllo. She is 45 years old and lives with her husband and three children. She started her business first by taking courses at an NGO. When she finished her schooling she started making sweets that shed learned how to make at home and shed sell them to her neighbors. She currently has a regular customer base that she sells to, especially on weekends. Her goal is to have her own pastry shop where she can sell her sweets. She will use the loan to buy cake making ingredients.

loan.use: to buy cake making ingredients.

loan.name: Gerardo

texts.es: Francisco, tiene la edad de 54 aos, est casado y vive con su hijo y su esposa que son su mayor prioridad. El pretende con el crdito realizar la compra de los fertilizantes para la asistencia de su cafetal. El cuenta con la propiedad y es adecuada para la buena explotacin de este cultivo, adems ya la tiene sembrada y lo que necesita es asistirla para as obtener mejores resultados. El quiere generar los recursos necesarios para seguir adelante con su proyecto y darle cada da a su familia un mejor bienestar econmico. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en:
Francisco is 54 years old. Hes married and lives with his son and wife who are his greatest priority in life. He intends to use the loan to buy fertilizer for his coffee plantation. He has a piece of land that is well conditioned to grow this particular crop. Besides, he already has it planted and what he needs is to help it along to obtain the best results. He wants to generate the necessary resources to move forward with his project and provide his family every day with better economic wellbeing.
This is the first loan hes gotten from FUDECOSUR. He hadnt had previous loans with state banks. FUDECOSUR provided the loan with the best terms and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to buy fertilizer.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy flower seeds and manure.

loan.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose F. es de Mollejones, y es conocido por ser una persona muy emprendedora y trabajadora. El se dedica a la agricultura y desde poco ha tenido muchos problemas con su vivienda, Ya que hubo un deslizamiento de tierra muy cerca de su casa. Es por eso que necesita pagar la mano de obra para votar la gran cantidad de tierra que cay en frente de si casa. Para eso necesitara un prstamo de 300 000 (Trescientos mil colones). El est muy agradecido ya que este tipo de instituciones siempre estn Disponibles cuando uno lo necesita. El es socio de la empresa de Crdito Comunal Bancruce, una de las 110 empresas socias de EDESA en Costa Rica.
texts.en: Jose F. is from Mollejones and is known as an enterprising and hard-working person. He is a farmer and lately has started having problems with his house since there was a landslide very nearby. That is the reason he needs to pay for labor to move the large amount of mud that landed in front of his house. He is requesting a loan of 300 thousand colones. Juan F. is very grateful for this type of institution that is always ready to help when needed. He is a member of the Bancruce communal bank, one of the 110 branches of EDESA in Costa Rica.

loan.use: To protect against landslides

loan.name: Gredin

texts.es: Gredin, tiene la edad de 33 aos, est soltero y vive con sus padres. El pretende con el crdito realizar la compra de los insumos para la asistencia de su cafetal y la mano de obra. El pretende con realizarle esta mejora su cafetal produzca mayores cantidades de caf esta prxima cosecha. El cuanta con la plantacin existente en buenas condiciones y quiere es mejorarla para que tenga una buena floracin y as poder obtener rangos de cosechas ms grandes. El pretende generar los ingresos necesarios para el bienestar de el y sus padres y seguir saliendo adelante con su proyecto cafetalero. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en: Gredin is 33 years old, single and lives with his parents. With the loan, he hopes to purchase raw materials for his coffee crops and to hire workers. He hopes this will improve his coffee production for the upcoming harvest. His coffee crops are in good condition and he wants to improve them so they have better flowering and he can secure a larger harvest. Gredin hopes to earn the necessary income to ensure his well-being and that of his parents and so he can continue making headway as a coffee producer. This is his first loan with Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR is providing him with a loan with better credit facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to purchase raw materials for his coffee crops and to hire workers.

loan.name: Construyendo Un Futuro Mejor Group

texts.es: El seor YONO D. 43 aos D. edad, es casado pero no tiene hijos , es obrero D. profesin y con la ayuda D. su actual pareja aperturo un bazar en un mercado ya que en esos momentos no haba una obra D. construccin para que el trabaje. Los crdito otorgado por EDAPROSPO los invierte en la compra D. productos para surtir el bazar. En el futuro al Seor YONO le gustara aperturar un negocio en otro lugar.
texts.en: Yono is a member of the "Building A Better Future" group. He is 43 years old and married but has no children. He is a laborer by profession and with the help of his wife he set up a general store in a market since at this time there are not construction jobs for him to work. With the group loan approved by Kiva partner EDAPROSPO, he plans to purchase products to stock his store. In the future, Yono would like to open a business in another location.

loan.use: to purchase products to stock a general store.

loan.name: Cristian

texts.es: Cristian, tiene la edad de 21 aos, est soltero, vive con sus padres y sus hermanos. El pretende con el crdito realizar la compra de los insumos y la semilla del frijol para su posterior siembra. El cuenta con el rea para la siembra y la experiencia necesaria para la buena explotacin de este cultivo. El quiere establecer un cultivo bueno del cual pueda sacarle las ganancia para su bienestar y as poder invertir en lo mismo e ir realizando ms grande su proyecto y fortalecido cada da ms. Es el primer prstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no haba tenido antes otros prstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el prstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho ms baja.
texts.en: Cristian is 21 years old, single and lives with his parents and his siblings. With the loan, he hopes to purchase raw materials and bean seeds for his next planting session. He has an area of land to plant and the necessary experience to ensure a good harvest. He wants to establish a good crop so he can earn income for his own well-being and can reinvest in his land and continue making it bigger and better every day. This is the first loan he has received from Kiva partner FUDECOSUR. He has not had previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has provided him with a loan with better credit facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loan.use: to purchase raw materials and bean seeds for his next planting session.

loan.name: Rosa Vilma

texts.es: Rosa, vive con su esposo y 5 hijos D. los cuales dos trabajan y los dems estudian, ella se dedica a la venta D. ropa y su esposo al cultivo D. maz, el comercio lo tiene desD. hace 7 aos, vendiendo casa por casa, adems con su esposo cultivan el maz. Ella solicita un prstamo para adquirir los materiales agrcolas, ya que su esposo se dispone a sembrar la milpa, para esto comprara abono, fertilizantes y semilla, este crdito le ayudara a tener los insumos necesarios para obtener una mejor cosecha, con la oportunidad D. comercializar una parte y contar con ingresos. El sueo D. Rosa es sacar a sus hijos adelante, con sus estudios y tener la oportunidad D. verlos profesionalmente formados.
texts.en: Rosa lives with her husband and their 5 children: two who work and the others who are in school. She sells clothes and her husband grows corn. She has had her business for 7 years selling house to house and also helping her husband with the corn. Rosa is requesting a loan to purchase some agricultural products since her husband is ready to plant the crop. For this she will buy manure, fertilizer and seeds. The financing will help them purchase the necessary products for a better harvest, with more opportunity of selling a part of the crop and receiving money for it. Rosas dream is to get her sons ahead with their schooling and to have the opportunity of seeing them become professionals.

loan.use: To buy manure, fertilizer and seeds to plant corn

loan.name: Timotea

texts.es: Timotea, vive con su esposo y dos hijas, se dedica al comercio de ropa, medicina natural y cosmticos, esta venta la realiza de forma ambulante, recorre varios caseros y cantones ofreciendo sus productos, esta actividad le ayuda a tener ingresos para solventar las necesidades del hogar. Ella actualmente solicita un prstamo para la compra de blusas, faldas, ropa interior y cremas, lociones, maquillajes, con esta inversin podr ofrecer a los clientes, variedad de productos para su demanda. El objetivo de Ella es que el negocio sea rentable en el largo plazo y ayudar a su familia para superarse poco a poco de su actual condicin.
texts.en:
Timotea lives with her husband and two daughters. She is an itinerant vendor of clothing, natural medicines, and cosmetics. She travels to different villages and hamlets offering her products. This work helps her have income to take care of the her household's needs.
She is requesting a loan to buy blouses, skirts, undergarments, creams, lotions, and makeup. With this investment, she will be able to offer her clients a variety of products to meet their demands. Timotea'a goal is for her business to be profitable in the long run and to help her family improve their situation little by little.

loan.use: to buy blouses, skirts, undergarments, creams, lotions, and makeup

loan.name: Las Emprendedoras De La F Group

texts.es: L. Sra. Vicenta es conviviente, tiene 4 hijos, actualmente es integrante en L. alcanca comunal Las Emprendedoras D. L. F grupo conformado por 8 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Vicenta trabaja desD. hace 10 aos en su propia bodega donD. venD. dulces, abarrotes etc. elL. empez vendiendo algunos productos, tiempo despus pudo ampliar su negocio, Nos cuenta que nada fue fcil porque trabajo muy duro junto a su esposo , pero gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicacin ha logrado mejores ingresos econmicos, sus hijos cuentan con educacin y sobretodo tienen una mejor calidad D. vida , Vicenta nos cuenta que como mujer se siente muy orgullosa e independiente, El prstamo que se le otorgo fue para comprar mercadera, dulces, arroz azcar leche y dems abarrotes . Sabemos que Vicenta cumplir sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Mrs. Vicenta has a common-law husband and four children. She is in the communal bank "LAS EMPRENDEDORAS D. L. F", which is comprised of eight members who are merchants in different activities. For ten years Vicenta has been running her own store where she sells sweets, groceries, etc. She started out selling only a few products, but later expanded her business. She says it has not been easy for her and her husband who, through their joint effort and dedication, have been able to improve their income. Their children are getting an education and have a better lifestyle. Vicenta says she feels very proud to be an independent woman. She will use the loan to buy goods such as sweets, rice, sugar, milk and other groceries. We know that Vicenta will reach her goals with a lot of work and effort, and the Edaprospo loans will help in that regard.

loan.use: To buy goods (sweets and groceries).

loan.name: Jose Luciano

texts.en: Jose Luciano is 48 years old and lives in the San Lorenzo region of Honduras with his four dependent children. Jose Luciano has worked his whole life as a fisherman, and presentlly employs an assistant in his small business. He currently has $1,500 saved to invest in a small fishing boat that costs $2,000and is thus requesting a loan of $500 to cover the remaining balance. His long term goal is to have several small fishing vessels with which he can expand his business and earn more income to support his family.

loan.use: To purchase a fishing boat.

loan.name: Rene

texts.es:
Rene de 23 aos, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con solo servicio de luz en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertnece al departamento de Piura. La zona se caracteriza por ser de mucha actividad agricola, ganadera y artesana.
Rene se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) desde hace varios aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus ovejas est en la parte posterior de su casa, los cra con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ideal las ofrece en el mercado de Tambogrande y Piura. Con eldinero que va adquirir por sus ovejas podr atender sus necesidades personales. Su padre le a dado en herencia unas tierras de cultivo donde siembra limn.
A solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1800 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de sus animales. Tambin lo utilizar para la compre de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo y su producto. Rene es una persona responsable y trabajadora con la nica intensin de ayudar econmica a sus padres en la casa como para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rene, 23, is single living in his parents house which only has electricity in Tambogrande District that belongs to Piura Department. The area is known for having much farming, livestock raising and crafts making.
Rene has raised sheep for several years. The corral holding his sheep is in his back yard. He feeds them nutritionally balanced feed like natural grasses and once they reach ideal size he sells them in the Tambogrande and Piura markets. Money he gets from the sale of his sheep is used to cover his personal expenses. His father has passed on some farmland to him where he grows lemons.
He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for an 1800 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed thus insuring good growth and development of his animals. He will also use it to buy fertilizer to improve his farmland and thus his crop yields.
Rene is a very responsible, hard working person whose only aim is helping his parents his parents economically at home to have a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy animal feed and crop fertilizers.

loan.name: Jose Del Carmen

texts.es:
Jos de 49 aos, vive en su casa propia con su esposa, ubicada en el distrito de Olmos, que pertenece al departamento de la Lambayeque. Esta zona se dedica a la agricultura y ganadera.
Desde hace algunos aos Jos se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra limn y maracuya, son productos que puede cosechar semanal y quincenalmente, el mismo que vende en los diferentes mercados de la zona, vendiendolo al por mayor y menor, con la finalidad de aumentar sus ingresos y poder solventar sus gastos de su casa.
Ha solicitado un prstamo de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para brindar mantenimiento y comprar fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo, con las ganancias que obtenga con la venta de sus cosechas podr pagar su crdito como tener una mejor calidad de vida. Jos es una persona responsable y trabajadora que lo nico que quiere es sacar adelante su negocio y tener ms comodidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Jos is 49 years old and lives together with his wife in his own home, in Olmos district, in Lambayeque department. The people in this area farm and raise livestock.
Jos has been farming for some years. He owns his own farm land where he sows lemons and passion fruit. These are products that he can harvest weekly and fortnightly. He sells them in the different markets in his area, both wholesale and retail, with the goal of increasing his income and covering his household expenses.
Jos has requested a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can care for his crops and buy fertilizers in order to improve his land. He will use the profits from the sale of his harvests to repay his loan and improve his quality of life. Jos is a responsible and hard-working person and the only thing he wants is to get ahead in his business and enjoy more comforts at home.

loan.use: to care for his crops and buy fertilizers for his land

loan.name: Tatiana Anabel

texts.es:
En la parroquia Rio Chico del cantn Portoviejo, encontramos un lugar conocido como San Clemente, aqu cada quince das se renen las socias del Banco Comunal San Clemente De Rio Chico, este lugar es conocido por su vegetacin y porque la mayora de su gente se dedica al agro.
En este lugar conocimos a la seora Tatiana, tiene 20 aos de edad y mantiene una relacin de unin libre de la cual tiene un hijo de tres aos. El marido es comerciante. Est en el Banco Comunal desde el inicio y le gusta porque gracias a los crditos ella ha podido ir aumentando ms su negocio.
Es una joven ama de casa que divide su tiempo entre su hogar y su trabajo, ya que tambin se dedica a la venta de artculos tanto para el hogar como de uso personal, estos los hace a travs del sistema de cartillas, el mismo que consiste en buscar cierta cantidad de clientes para luego cada semana realizar las entregas de los productos que pidieron y tambin realizar los cobros respectivos. Tambin en su casa realiza trabajos de cortes de cabello, pintado de uas entre otros trabajos de belleza, nos cuenta que lleva dos aos que se dedica a esta actividad y que le va bastante bien.
Este crdito lo va a emplear en comprar ms artculos para el hogar como: planchas, ventiladores, colchones, licuadoras entre otras cosas.
Su sueo es tener su casa propia ya que vive en casa del suegro.
En la foto nuestra socia est con su pequeo hijo.
texts.en:
In the Rio Chico parish of the Portoviejo Canton, there is a place called San Clemente where the members of the communal bank "SAN CLEMENTE DE RIO CHICO" meet every two weeks. This area is known for its lush vegetation and the fact that most people are involved in agriculture.
Here we meet Mrs. Tatiana, 20, who has a common-law husband and a three-year-old son. Her husband is a merchant. She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and has been able to expand her business with the loans she has received through the bank.
She is a young homemaker who divides her time between taking care of the home and working. She sells household and personal care articles. She does this by taking orders from enough customers each week to later go out and deliver the orders and collect payment. At home she also cuts hair, and paints finger-nails among other beauty services she provides. For two years she has been doing this and things have gone well for her.
The loan will be used to buy household items such as irons, fans, mattresses and blenders, among others.
Her dream is to have her own house someday since she now lives with her father-in-law.
This member is shown in the photograph with her young son.

loan.use: To buy irons, fans, mattresses, blenders, etc.

loan.name: Lester Rolando

texts.es:
Lester de 30 aos, es soltero, vive en casa de sus padres, cuenta con solo servicio de luz en el distrito de Tambogrande que pertnece al departamento de Piura. La zona se caracteriza por ser de mucha actividad agricola, ganadera y artesana.
Lester se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino (ovejas) desde hace varios aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus ovejas son apropiados y espaciosos; se encuentran en la parte posterior de su casa, los cra con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ideal las ofrece en el mercado de Tambogrande y Piura. Con el dinero que va adquirir por sus ovejas podr atender sus necesidades personales. Su padre le a dado en herencia unas tierras de cultivo donde siembra limn, es otra forma como se ayuda econmicamete.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos balanceados asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de sus animales. Tambin lo utilizar para la compra de fertilizantes para mejorar sus tierras de cultivo y su producto. Lester es una persona responsable y trabajadora con la nica intensin de ayudar econmica a sus padres en la casa como para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lester, 30, is single living in his parents house which only has electricity in Tambogrande District that belongs to Piura Department. The area is known for having much farming, livestock raising and crafts making.
Lester has raised sheep for several years. The corral holding his sheep is spacious and appropriate and located in his back yard. He feeds them nutritionally balanced feed like natural grasses and once they reach ideal size he sells them in the Tambogrande and Piura markets. Money he gets from the sale of his sheep is used to cover his personal expenses. His father has passed on some farmland to him where he grows lemons which are an additional source of economic help.
He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed thus insuring good growth and development of his animals. He will also use it to buy fertilizer to improve his farmland and thus his crop yields.
