The members of the group operate a wide range of retail businesses: corner shops; sales of seasonal merchandise; cola sales; Avon product sales; crafts sales; shoe sales; and kiosk sales.
Sra. Maria says that this is the first time that she has worked with Pro Mujer. She joined, at the invitation of a friend, after reading a brochure about the bank. She operates a business selling cosmetics, a business that she started with her husband six months ago.
She will use the loan to stock her business (with cosmetics). The business provides her with a means to support her family that is better than any other open to her.
Sra. Eva had to leave before the photograph was taken because she had to tend to a daughter who was ill.

loan.use: to buy products for her cosmetics sales business.

loan.name: Bienvenue

texts.fr:
Femme ge de 43ans, marie et mre dun enfant g de 21ans, elle a un niveau terminal e, en 2004, par manque de soutient elle avait prfr de se lancer dans la vente de foufou en gros et dtail avec un capital de 400.000Frs.
Ses recettes sont 150.000F 425.000F aprs 2 jours et elle vend non loin de son domicile ce qui lui permet de commencer trs tt son activit.
Avec le prt de HOPE, elle veut renforcer le stock de son aliment en achetant des sacs de foufou Trs gentille, son souhait est toujours de satisfaire ses clients en leur offrant des meilleurs prix.
Pour le bien de sa famille, elle compte construire une maison et voyager pour lachat des marchandises.
texts.en:
A 43 year old woman, married with one child aged 21,she reached the end of high school but in 2004 due to lack of support she chose to take up the sale of fufu wholesale and retail with a starting capital of 400.000Frs.
Her income is from 150.000F to 425.000F for two days and she has her commerce not far from her home which enables her to open her business very early.
With the loan from Hope, she wants to increase her stock of fufu by buying sacks of it.
She is very kind and she always does her best to satisfy her customers by keeping her prices as low as possible.
For her familys well being, she intends to build a house and to travel to purchase her goods.

loan.use: purchase sacks of fufu.

loan.name: Yawa Angle

texts.fr: Age de 35ans, Yawa est vendeuse des condiments (tomates, piments, oignons) dans une boutique dans son quartier. Elle est marie un peintre auto et ils ont 01 enfant. Elle est son deuxime crdit et ce montant lui permettra acheter des condiments quelle achte au Grand march de Lom. Son activit a dmarr en 2004 et elle veut assurer un avenir meilleur son enfant. Elle a dautres ambitions ajoutes une activit complmentaire la premire.
texts.en:
Yawa is 35 years old. She is married to an automobile painter with whom she has one child. She sells condiments (tomatoes, peppers, onions) in a neighborhood shop.
This is her second loan, which she will use to stock up on condiments at the Grand market of Lom.
She launched this activity in 2004, and she wants to ensure a better future for her child. She also plans to complement her current activity with a secondary occupation.

loan.use: to buy condiments such as tomatoes, peppers and onions for resale

loan.name: Adjoavi

texts.fr: Mre de 02 enfants et ge de 36ans, Mme Adjoavi a dmarr son activit (vente de mais) en 2007. Elle sapprovisionne dans les villages et fermes du Togo et revend au march dAkodessewa. Elle veut renforcer son activit et prendre soin de ses deux enfants cest pour cela elle sollicite ce premier crdit pour acheter des stocks.
texts.en: A mother of two and 36 years old, Mrs. Adjoavi started her business (corn retail) in 2007. She gets her supplies from villages and farms in Togo, and resells at the Akodessewa market. She wants to strengthen her business and take care of her two children, which is why she is requesting this first loan to purchase stocks.

loan.use: to buy cereals (corn).

loan.name: Amazonas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. AMAZONAS iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Maria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: comercio, produccin y servicio
La seora Maria indica que es la primera vez que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de promocin puerta a puerta. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de trenzado de mantas, que inicio hace quince aos.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de material para el trenzado de mantas), que consiguieran por mayor de la calle Rodrguez (lugar comercial de la ciudad de La Paz) y los vender a pedido.. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta trabajar en grupo.
texts.en:
The AMAZONAS community bank, associated with Centro Senkata, is embarking on its first round of funding from Pro Mujer. The group's eight members are lead by a board headed by Sra. Maria. The members of the group operate businesses ranging from commerce to manufacturing to services.
Sra. Maria says that this is the first time she has worked with Pro Mujer. She joined after a door-to-door campaign. She has operated a business making and selling blankets for fifteen years.
She will use the loan to buy the supplies she needs to operate the business (materials for making blankets). She plans to buy bulk supplies of everything she needs on Calle Rodriguez (a commercial area of La Paz) and make blankets to order. The business provides her with a means to help her husband with their daily expenses.
When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that she likes working with a team.

loan.use: to buy supplies for her knitting business.

loan.name: Lita

texts.es:
Lita tiene 45 aos D. edad y vive en una zona urbana en vas D. desarrollo perteneciente al distrito D. Chiclayo. Ella cuenta con casa propia que cuenta D. todos los servicios bsicos.
Lita tiene un negocio dentro D. uno D. los mercados ms populares D. Chiclayo, el mercado Modelo. Lita venD. comida al paso y entre sus principales productos se encuentran el tradicional champs (postre tpico del norte, similar a una avena hecha D. maz) y las cachangas (especie D. empanada D. queso). El puesto D. Lita es bastante conocido en el mercado. Tiene ms D. 15 aos D. experiencia vendiendo estos alimentos y cuenta con clientela fija, que la visita diariamente para comer sus ricos productos.
Lita solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo D. 3000 nuevos soles para invertir en la compra D. insumos para su negocio. Adems parte del prstamo ser destinada a la educacin D. uno D. sus hijos.
Lita es una clienta recurrente D. nuestra entidad y estara muy agradecida si se le conceD. el crdito pues le permitir seguir dndole una buena educacin a su hijo y continuar con su negocio. Lita goza D. buenas referencias personales y laborales.
texts.en:
Lita, 45, lives in a developing urban zone belonging to Chiclayo District. She has her own house which has all basic utilities.
Lita has a business insiD. one of Chiclayos most popular markets, the Modelo Market. She sells food to passersby and among her main products are the traditional champs (typical dessert from the north similar to oatmeal maD. from corn) and cachangas (a type of cheese turnover). Litas stand is quite well known in the market. She has more than 15 years experience selling these foods and she has a fixed base of regular customers who visit her daily to enjoy her delicious products.
Lita is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 3000 new sol loan to buy ingredients for her business. In addition, part of the loan will be used for the education of one of her children.
Lita is a recurring client of our firm and she would be very grateful if the loan is granted because it will allow her to continue providing a good education for her son and to stay in business. Lita enjoys good personal and work related references.

loan.use: to buy ingredients to prepare "champu" and "cachangas" and to cover her son's educational expenses.

loan.name: Ayl

texts.fr: Mre de 03 enfants et ge de 31ans, Mme Ayl a dmarr son activit (vente de mais, huile, farine) en 2007. Elle a 03 enfants et marie un frigoriste. Elle sapprovisionne au march dAkodessewa et revend de faon ambulante. Elle veut renforcer son activit, avoir son propre magasin et prendre soin de ses trois enfants cest pour cela elle sollicite ce troisieme crdit pour acheter des stocks.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ayl is 31 years old. She is married to a refrigerationist, and they have three (3) children). She sells maize, oil, and flour, an activity she launched in 2007. She buys her stock at the Akodessewa market and sells door to door.
She is seeking a third loan to stock up on merchandise and strengthen her business, acquire her own store, and take care of her three children.

loan.use: to buy maize and oil for resale

loan.name: Marcelino

texts.es:
Marcelino es un joven padre de familia de 26 aos de edad. l vive con su esposa y dos menores hijos en una pequea comunidad rural de condicin humilde, donde la gente se dedica principalmente al comercio de animales. Esta comunidad pertenece al distrito de Mrrope Lambayeque.
Marcelino se dedica desde hace 4 aos a la crianza y venta de animales (cerdos, patos, chivos y pollos) en la parte exterior de su domicilio, una vez que sus animales se encuentren en las condiciones adecuadas, Marcelino los comercializa quincenalmente a los pobladores de su zona.
Marcelino solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crdito de 1500 nuevos soles para mejorar instalaciones de corral y as poder albergar ms animales a los que pueda darles el cuidado adecuado. Adems, Marcelino pretende ampliar su negocio, con la compra de cerdos y otros animales, para poder aumentar ventas que le permitan cubrir sus necesidades bsicas.
texts.en:
Marcelino is a young father who is 26 years old. He lives with his wife and two dependent children in a small, poor, rural community whose residents mainly work selling animals. The community is located in Mrrope district, in Lambayeque.
Marcelino has been raising and selling animals (pigs, ducks, goats and chickens) for four years. He keeps his animals outside his home and, once they have sufficiently grown, he sells them every two weeks to the people who live in his area.
Marcelino is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that he can improve his animal pens which will allow him to house more animals. Marcelino also plans to expand his business by purchasing pigs and other animals. This will enable him to increase his sales which, in turn, will enable him to cover his basic needs.

loan.use: to buy more animals and improve the pen where they live

loan.name: Modesta

texts.es:
Modesta es una mujer felizmente casada de 50 aos. Ella vive en una pequea comunidad rural en vas de desarrollo ubicada a 25 minutos del distrito de Tambogrande.
Modesta tiene un negocio de venta de comidas y bebidas que lo desarrolla en un puesto ubicado a pocas cuadras de su casa. Ella tiene gran experiencia en su negocio, pues lo viene desarrollando desde hace 30 aos y cuenta con clientela establecida.
Modesta solicita un prstamo de 1500 nuevos soles, a Edpyme Alternativa, para invertir en la compra de mercadera (gaseosas, cervezas, golosinas) y en mejoras dentro de su espacio de trabajo.
Modesta desea ofrecerles a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos y una mejor atencin (mejoras de ambiente). Esto le permitir seguir creciendo en su negocio y por lo tanto tener mayores ingresos para el bienestar de su familia. Modesta goza de buenas referencias personales.
texts.en:
Modesta is a happily married 50 year old woman. She lives in a small rural community in the process of developing that is located about 25 minutes from the district of Tambogrande.
Modesta has a business selling food and beverages at a stand located a few blocks from her house. She has a lot of experience with her business, because she has been developing it for thirty years and she has an established customer base.
Modesta is asking for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa to invest in the purchase of merchandise (sodas, beer, sweets), and to make improvements to her workspace.
Modesta wants to offer her customers a better variety of products and better service from the improvements in the environment. This will allow her to continue growing her business and earn more income for the well-being of her family. Modesta has good personal references.

loan.use: to purchase a larger quantity of products to expand her business.

loan.name: Satelite Group

texts.es:
La A.C. SATELITE iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Esther. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: venta de cotillones, chofer, transporte de cosmticos, venta de mercadera en general, artesana, venta de ropa de bebe, costura de cortinas, venta de cosmticos.
La seora Esther, indica que hace tres aos que trabaja en Pro Mujer, pero en otro centro focal; y que integro la institucin por invitacin de sus amigas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de cotillones que viene trabajando hace siete aos, aprendiendo el mismo de su mam.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para la compra de material para su negocio (compra cartn, papeles de color, etc.) materiales que comprar por mayor de la cuidad de La Paz y que posterior a la elaboracin lo vender en la zona villa Victoria. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es casada y tiene seis hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta todo.
texts.en:
The SATELITE community bank, associated with Centro Los Andes, is embarking on its first round of funding from Pro Mujer. The group's eight members are lead by a board headed by Sra. Esther. The members of the group operate a wide range of businesses: sales of party decorations; taxi services; sales of general merchandise; crafts sales; sales of baby clothes; curtain-making services; and cosmetics sales.
Sra. Esther says that she has worked with Pro Mujer for three years, but at another "centro focal". She joined the bank after being invited by friends. She has operated a business selling party decorations for seven years, a business that she learned from her mother.
She will use the loan to stock her business (with posters, colored paper, etc.). She plans to buy wholesale supplies of the products in La Paz and sell them later in the town of Victoria. The business provides her with a means to help her husband and their six children.
When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that she likes everything about it.

loan.use: to buy merchandise for her party decorations business.

loan.name: Lorenzo

texts.es:
Lorenzo tiene 48 aos de edad, est casado y tiene 2 hijas a su cargo. Esta familia vive en casa propia en una comunidad rural pequea perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande Piura.
Lorenzo se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, porcino y aves de corral. Actualmente cuenta con 10 ovejas, 4 porcinos y 20 pavos. Lorenzo tambin es agricultor y tiene un terreno agrcola en el cual ha sembrando mango, para su comercializacin. Adems, l labora como pen en un trabajo estable en un fundo de su zona donde se siembra mango.
Lorenzo solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 500 nuevos soles que destinar en la compra de de alimento balanceado para sus animales. As como para la compra de fertilizantes y agroqumicos para su sembro de mango.
Lorenzo goza de buenas referencias personales y laborales y este crdito le sera de gran utilidad.
texts.en:
Lorenzo, 48, is married and has two daughters in his care. This family lives in their own house in a small, rural community belonging to Tambogrande-Piura District.
Lorenzo raises sheep, pigs and barnyard fowl. He currently has ten sheep, four pigs and twenty turkeys. Lorenzos also a farmer. He has a field where he grows mangoes to sell. In addition, he works as a laborer at a regular job at a local large farming complex that grows mangoes.
Lorenzo is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 500 new sol loan to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed as well as fertilizer and farming chemicals for his mango crops.
Lorenzo has good personal and work related references and this loan would be of great use to him.

loan.use: to buy animal feed and crop fertilizer.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy a food stall for his prepared foods business.

loan.name: Olga Azucena

texts.es:
Olga es una cliente de 31 aos de edad. Ella es madre de familia de dos nios que se encuentran en edad escolar. Olga y sus hijos viven en casa de su madre ubicada en el distrito de Jos Leonardo Ortiz, en una zona urbana que cuenta con todos los servicios bsicos.
Olga se dedica a la venta de preparados como soya, avena, quinua, en la puerta de una panadera de su comunidad. Adems, Olga vende al contado y a crdito cosmticos y prendas de vestir por catlogo y es una comerciante, bastante conocida en el sector, con ms de 12 aos de experiencia en el rubro. Cuenta con clientela establecida en ambos negocios y tiene muchos deseos de superarse en el desarrollo de estos.
Olga solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 1200 nuevos soles que invertir en su negocio. Ella comprar una congeladora que le ayudar a mantener en buen estado los productos que vende, esto le permitir darle una mejor calidad de servicio a sus clientes y por lo tanto aumentar sus ingresos.
Olga es una cliente recurrente de nuestra institucin y goza de buenas referencias personales y laborales.
texts.en:
Olga is a 31-year-old client. Shes the mother of two children who are school aged. Olga and her children live in her mothers house located in Jos Leonardo Ortiz District, an urban zone that has all basic utilities.
Olga sells prepared items like soy, oatmeal and quinoa at the entrance of a bakery in her community. She also sells cosmetics and catalogue items of clothing for cash and on credit. She is a very well known merchant in the zone with more than 12 years experience in the line of work. She has an established clientele in each of her businesses and she has a strong drive to improve her development in them.
Olga asks Edpyme Alternativa for a 1200 new sol loan to invest in her business. She will buy a freezer that will help her keep the items she sells in good condition. This will allow her to provide better customer service and thus to increase her income. Olga is a recurring client of our firm and she has good personal and work related references.

loan.use: to buy a freezer.

loan.name: Albert Antonio

texts.es: Albert es un joven de 27 aos que vive en la ciudad de Cartagena de Indias y tiene un negocio en el cual se dedica a la venta, decoracin y a la provisin de artculos para fiestas en diversos eventos. Su negocio fue primero de un familiar y su hermana y l estaban all empleados, hasta que el propietario de esta microempresa decidi dedicarse a otra actividad en la cual tena mayor experiencia y dio a Albert y a su hermana la primera opcin de compra y hasta el momento han logrado sacarlo adelante, pero quieren hacerlo crecer. Este es justamente la meta que en la actualidad tiene Albert porque necesita comprar una maquinaria para adicionarle a su negocio la decoracin de vasos que tambin sirven como regalos y pueden tambin venderlos a otros negocios; proyectan que esta sea una inversin exitosa pues ya han revisado esta alternativa en el mercado y a sus clientes les gusta la idea, adems no tener competencia cercana. Su sueo es lograr el reconocimiento en la ciudad y convertir su negocio en una casa de evento, avanzar profesionalmente y programar una familia a la cual pueda ofrecerle oportunidades de prosperar. Albert e un joven persistente y gracias al apoyo de su hermana ha logrado avanzar en el tema de calidad de sus productos y servicios, por eso su propuesta inmediata es fortalecer su unidad de negocios.
texts.en:
Albert is a 27 year old living in the city of Cartagena de Indias and he has a business which sells decorations and party goods for various events. His business was first owned by a family member and Albert and his sister were employed there until the owner of this small business decided to pursue other activities in which he had more experience and gave Albert and his sister first bids on buying the place. So far they have managed to pull it off, but they want to grow the business. This is precisely Albert's goal now because he needs to buy a machine for adding decorative glasses to his business. The glasses double as gifts and can also be sold to other businesses. Albert projected that this will be a successful investment so they have already reviewed this alternative in the market and their customers like the idea; plus there is no nearby competition.
Albert's dream is to achieve recognition in the city and turn his business into a house event, advance professionally and to have a family that he can offer opportunities to succeed. Albert is a persistent young man, and with the support of his sister, he has made progress on the issue of providing quality products and services. His immediate proposal is to strengthen his business unit.

loan.use: to purchase machinery to add decorative glasses to his business.

loan.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es: A la vivienda de la seora Maria Teresa le esta haciendo los acabados del interior y exterior de su casa. Solicita un prstamo para comprar el material que es cemento y pintura, ya que su esposo el seor Joel se encargara de realizar la mejora en horario adicional a su trabajo ya que se dedica a la construccin. La seora Maria Teresa se encargara de pagar el crdito con el ingreso que tiene de su trabajo como asistente administrativo de una escuela. Desea mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos ya que tiene tres que actual mente estn estudiando.
texts.en:
Mara Teresas house is lacking both interior and exterior finishing touches. She is asking for a loan to buy materials like cement and paint since her husband, Joel, who works in construction, will do the work during his time off.
Mara Teresa will repay the loan with income she earns working as an Administrative Assistant at a school.
She wants to improve her childrens quality of life since she has three children currently in school.

loan.use: to do interior and exterior finishing touches on her house.

loan.name: Teresa Giovanny

texts.es:
Teresa tiene 36 aos de edad, ella es una madre soltera que vive junto a su hija de 16 aos en casa de su madre, ubicada en la zona urbano marginal del distrito de Tcume. La zona donde Teresa vive cuenta con los servicios bsicos y es una comunidad pequea con deseos de superacin.
Teresea se dedica a la crianza y comercializacin de animales menores como aves y cerdos, labor que realiza desde hace 15 aos, teniendo experiencia otorgada por su madre con la cual inicio este negocio. Teresa cuenta con clientela establecida en su zona, que prefieren sus animales debido al buen cuidado y crianza que Teresa les da. Adicionalmente, cuenta con otros ingresos producto de la venta de abarrotes.
Ella solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que invertir en la compra de alimento balanceado para sus animales. Teresa garantiza el xito de su negocio, pues este cuenta con un mercado amplio de comercializacin.
Teresa estara muy agradecida de concedrsele el crdito pues le permitira un desarrollo econmico.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 36-year-old single mother who lives with her 16-year-old daughter in her mothers home, located in the outskirts of the Tcume district. The area where Teresa lives has basic services, and is a small community with aspirations to improve.
Teresas business is raising and selling small animals, such as fowl and pigs, which she has been doing for 15 years. She gained her experience from her mother, with whom she started the business. Teresa has a solid customer base in her area, customers who prefer her animals because of the careful way she raises them. In addition, she has other income, from selling general provisions.
She is requesting a loan of 1,000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa, to use to buy balanced feed for her animals. Teresa guarantees her operations success, because she enjoys a large market.
Teresa would be grateful for the loan, since it would allow her to grow financially.

loan.use: buy balanced feed for her animals.

loan.name: Edisson Rolando

texts.es:
Edisson Rolando tiene 29 aos, vive en Union Libre vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Fras de Medelln, perteneciente al Cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Edisson se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz desde hace 10 aos, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos es las enfermedades y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es tener dinero para arreglar la casa.
Le gusta salir con la familia.
texts.en:
Edisson Rolando is 29 years old. He's in a common law relationship and lives with his wife and children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The La Unin (Unity) communal bank is located in Aguas Fras de Medelln which belongs to Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.
Edisson has farmed corn for the last 10 years. He makes his purchases in Ventanas and his sales take place at daily farmers markets, especially Sundays.
He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. He faces challenges like illnesses and weather variations.
His dream is to have enough money to make home improvements. He enjoys going out with his family.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy stock items for her store.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Fras de Medelln, perteneciente al Cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Dalberto se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos es la competencia y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es ccomprar una casa
Le gusta trabajar.

Dalberto Bayron is 22 years old. Hes single living with his mother and brother in Vantanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The La Unin (Unity) communal bank is located in Aguas Fras de Medelln which belongs to Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.
Dalberto farms corn and beans. His purchases are done in Ventanas and his sales at daily farmers markets, especially Sundays.
He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. The challenges he faces are competition and weather variations.
His dream is to buy a house. He likes to work.

loan.name: Pedro

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 51 aos de edad. Es un hombre casado y vive con su familia en casa propia, ubicada en una comunidad rural perteneciente al distrito de Pitipo Ferreafe. La comunidad donde Pedro vive es pequea y est en vas de desarrollo.
Pedro se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores y de aves de corral (patos, gallinas, pollos) desde hace ms de 10 aos, dentro de su comunidad. Pedro cuenta con clientela establecida y desea invertir en mejorar los corrales en los cuales cra a sus animales, para que estn en buenas condiciones y para aumentar el nmero de estos.
Pedro cra a sus animales en la parte posterior de su domicilio, cuenta con un gran espacio donde est construyendo varios cuartos de corral y para terminar la construccin de estos solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 1500 nuevos soles, que le sern de gran utilidad para su actividad.
texts.en:
Pedro is 51 years old. He is a married man who lives with his family in his own home, located in a rural community in the district of Pitipo Ferreafe. The community where Pedro lives is small but it is developing.
Pedro has run a business in his community raising and selling small animals and barnyard fowl (ducks, hens, and chickens) for more than 10 years. Pedro has an established customer base, and he wants to invest in improving the corrals where he raises his animals, so that they will be in good condition, and so that he can have more of them.
Pedro raises his animals in the back of his house; he has a big space where he is building a number of pens. To finish the construction of these pens, he requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa of 1,500 Peruvian soles, which will be very useful for his business.

loan.use: to build pens for his animals in the back of his house

loan.name: Martha Beatriz

texts.es: La Sra. Martha solicito su crdito para terminar la losa de su domicilio ya que comenta que poco a poco a ido adquiriendo algo de material para construccin y en este momento lo que requiere es adquirir cemento para poder continuar con la realizacin de su proyecto, agradece de antemano el apoyo brindado para poder acondicionar su hogar.
texts.en: Martha is requesting a loan to finish tiling her house. She says that little by lttle she has been aquiring construction material and now she needs to get cement so she can continue with her project. She is thankful for the support offered her to fix up her home.

loan.use: To finish tiling her house

loan.name: Cruz Rocio

texts.es:
Cruz Rocio tiene 27 aos, es unida vive con el compaero y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Fras de Medelln, perteneciente al Cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Cruz se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, ademas se dedica al comercio venta de ropa en poicas cantidades las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos y un poco de mercaderia de ropa. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos es la competencia y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es seguir adelante y comprar terrenos.
Le gusta salir todos los domingos con la familia.
texts.en:
Cruz Roco is 27 years old. She has a spouse and children and is living in Vantanas Canton, Los Ros Province.
The La Unin (Unity) communal bank is located in Aguas Fras de Medelln which belongs to Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.
Cruz farms corn and rice. She also sells clothes in small amounts. Her purchases are done in Ventanas and her sales at daily farmers markets, especially Sundays.
She is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure and a bit of clothing. Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs. The challenges she faces are competition and weather variations.
Her dream is to progress and buy land. She enjoys going out with her family on Sundays.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure.

Johnny Alfredo is 25 years old. Hes single living with his parents in Ventanas Canton, Los Ros Province. He does not have children.
The La Unin (Unity) communal bank is located in Aguas Fras de Medelln which belongs to Ventanas Canton. The members of this communal bank are short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farmers.
Johnny Alfredo has farmed corn for the last five years. He does his purchases in Ventanas and his sales at daily farmers markets, especially Sundays
He is asking for the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer and manure. Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs. The challenges he faces are competition and weather variations.
His dream is to continue working and get ahead. He likes working in agriculture.

loan.name: Norma Leticia

texts.es: La Sra. Norma es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable que actualmente se dedica a la venta de ropa y de tenis , en esta ocasin requiere de nuestra ayuda para realizar la compra de mercanca, para poder ofrecer a sus clientes una mayor variedad de productos ya que ella se preocupa por brindarles un excelente servicio a sus clientes, agradece el apoyo brindado para realizar su proyecto, ya que este negocio representa la fuente principal de ingresos.
texts.en: Norma is a very hardworking and responsible person who currently sells clothing and tennis outfits. At this time, she requires assistance for the purchase of merchandise to offer customers a wider range of products as she is concerned about providing excellent service to her customers. She appreciates the support for her project, as this business represents her main source of income.

loan.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loan.name: Lucila Giralda

texts.es:
Lucila Giralda tiene 53 aos, Es soltera vive los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Fras de Medelln, perteneciente al Cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz, frejol gandul.
Lucila se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz desde hace 15 aos, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos es la competencia y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es compara casa para la familia.
Le gusta cocinar.
texts.en:
Lucila Giralda is 53 years old, single and lives with her children in the Ventanas Canton, Los Rios Province.
The members of the V.R.C. "La Union" are located in the enclosure Aguas Fras de Medelln, which is part of the Ventanas Canton. This group is involved in short rotation farming, and planting corn, rice, pigeon peas.
Lucila has been planting corn for 15 years. Her purchases are made in Ventanas and she sells in the markets every day, especially on Sundays.
She is requesting a loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. This loan would help financially meet her needs. Lucila faces challenges such as competition and climate change. Her dream is to buy a house for her family. She also likes to cook.

loan.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loan.name: Mariela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEOR DE TORRECHAYOC II; La socia vive en el distrito de Urubamba en la provincia de Urubamba, departamento del Cusco.
La socia tiene 34 aos de edad y La socia es conviviente; La socia tiene una tienda de abarrotes la cual ella va implementando poco a poco, segn el requerimiento de los productos de primera necesidad que son los que salen a diario como, arroz, azcar, leche, huevos, la socia tambin es vendedora al por mayor de huevos y ha implementado en su misma tienda de abarrotes en la entrada unos mdulos para exhibir los huevos al por mayor en cajitas especiales. La socia solicita el prstamo para invertir en la compra de huevos al por mayor y de productos de primera necesidad.
La socia valora y agradece infinitamente el crdito otorgado ya que este le permite crecer con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida, as mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo estipulado.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the SEOR DE TORRECHAYOC II communal bank. She lives in Urubamba District in Urubamba Province, Cusco Department.
The member is 34 years old and is in a relationship. She has a grocery store that she is gradually stocking according to basic need item requirements for items that sell daily like: rice, sugar, milk and eggs. She also sells eggs at wholesale and has set up special modules at the entrance to her store to display the wholesale eggs in their special little boxes. She is asking for a loan to buy eggs at wholesale as well as basic need items.
The member values and is infinitely grateful for the granted loan because it makes it possible for her to grow in business and improve her quality of life. At the same time, she commits to make her installment payments in a timely fashion.

loan.use: to buy eggs at wholesale as well as basic need items.

loan.name: Anonymous Group
loan.use: to buy sacks of charcoal and cans of kerosene for resale

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy miscellaneous items ( canned food, detergents, soap, pasta etc) and frozen foods

loan.name: Jahir Wladimir

texts.es:

Los miembros de la V.R.C. LA UNION se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Fras de Medelln, perteneciente al Cantn Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz, arroz, frejol gandul.
jahir se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz, arroz y frejol, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos es la competencia y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es es tener casa propia
Le gusta trabajar en el campo y difrutar las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Jahir Wladimir is 19 years old. He is single and lives with his parents. He lives in the canton of Ventanas, in Los Ros province.
The members of "LA UNION" communal bank get together in the Aguas Fras de Medelln district, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. The members of this communal bank work in agriculture, planting short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and pole beans.
Jahir works in agriculture, planting corn, rice and beans. He buys supplies in Ventanas and sells his products at the daily markets, especially the Sunday market.
He is requesting the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers and compost. With the help of the loan, he will improve his economic situation and be able to cover his needs. Some of the challenges he faces are the competition and the variations in the climate. His dream is to have his own house.
He likes to work in the fields and he enjoys the festivals in his district.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and compost.

loan.name: Lucia

texts.es: La seora Lucia es una cliente nueva en la institucin se dedica a la venta de juguetes por mayor y menor en la zona 14 de septiembre, tiene dos puestos de venta el primero, casada vive con su esposo y su hijo en la casa de sus Papas, su esposo trabaja como chofer de minibs en un sindicato de la ciudad de el alto el crdito esta destinado a la inversin de capital para su negocio compra de juguetes por mayor para surtir su tienda . Mas adelante piensa en la construccin de su vivienda que por el momento la casa solo tiene planta baja, es una persona joven muy trabajadora agradecida con la institucin por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Lucia is a new client of the Institution. She sells toys at wholesale and at retail in the "14 de Septiembre" neighborhood. She has two sales points.
She is married and lives with her husband and son in her parents house. Her husbands employed as a minibus driver in one of the city of El Altos transportation syndicates.
The loan will be used to buy toys at wholesale to stock her store. Later on shes thinking about building her house because at present it only has the bottom floor. She is a very hard working young person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loan.use: to buy toys.

loan.name: Concentidas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. CONCENTIDAS iniciar su cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del centro focal Los Andes, est compuesta por nueve integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Silveria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: comercio, produccin y servicio
La seora Silveria, indica que hace tres aos que trabaja en Pro Mujer, pero en otro centro focal; y que integro la institucin por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de ferretera que viene trabajando hace tres aos, aprendiendo el mismo de su esposo.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de variedad de herramientas y materiales de fierro) materiales que comprar por mayor en las tiendas y vender en su puesto de la Extranca de Rio Seco. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta todo, ahorro y capacitacin.
texts.en:
The CONCENTIDAS communal bank is beginning its fourth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Los Andes regional center. It is made up of nine members and led by a board of directors, headed by Silveria. The businesses carried out by the members are varied, including trade, production and services.
Silveria indicates that she has worked with Pro Mujer for three years, but in another regional center. She joined the institution on the invitation of a promoter. Currently, she has a hardware business which she has been operating for three years. She learned the business from her husband.
The loan she is requesting now is to increase her capital (buying a variety of tools and metal items). She will buy the items wholesale from stores and will sell them at her sales point in Extranca de Rio Seco. This manner of working allows her to generate resources to support her family, since she is a single mother with three children.
When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes everything, the savings and the training.

loan.use: to buy tools for her hardware store.

loan.name: Warawaritas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. WARAWARITAS iniciar su tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Hilda. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: confeccin de pantalones, venta de cosmticos, venta de pollos, venta de detergentes, trenzado de mantas, tienda de barrio, venta de carne.
La seora Hilda indica que es el tercer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitacin de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene una micro empresa de hilado y pollereria que inicio desde sus diez y seis aos, haciendo un total de veinte aos en este negocio.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para aumentar su capital (compra de material para el trenzado de mantas), que consiguieran por mayor de la C. Rodrguez (lugar comercial de la ciudad de La Paz) y los vender a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es soltera y tiene cinco hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta capacitacin y salud.
texts.en:
The WARAWARITAS communal bank will begin its third cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Center. It has 8 members and is led by a governing board headed by Hilda. The communal bank members are in a variety of businesses. Among them we have: pants manufacturing, cosmetics sales, chicken sales, detergent sales, textile weaving, grocery store and meat sales.
Hilda indicates that this is the third cycle shes worked with Pro Mujer. She joined thanks to an invitation from a promoter. She currently has a textile weaving micro business and a chicken shop that she's had since she was 16 years old; shes been in business a total of 20 years.
The loan shell take out now is to increase her capital. She will buy textile weaving materials at wholesale on Rodrguez Street (a commercial area in the city of La Paz) that shell then sell on order. This way of working makes it possible for her to support her family in some way since shes single and has five children.
When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer she answers: the training and the health services.

loan.use: to buy weaving supplies.

loan.name: Eder

texts.es: Eder es un joven de 25 aos de edad, que tiene un negocio llamado E Internet en el centro del municipio de Puerto Colombia, poblacin ubicada al noroccidente del departamento del Atlntico, que colinda al norte con las costas del mar Caribe. Eder es un publicista grfico y estudiante de ingeniera electrnica, que desde hace dos aos decidi dar curso libre a su capacidad emprendedora, mediante la apertura de un caf internet con el fin de fortalecer sus ingreso personales y lograr la meta de estudiar una carrera profesional. En su negocio ofrece servicios de llamadas telefnicas, fax, fotocopiaje,internet y articulos de papelera, entre los vecinos de su comunidad y en colegios cercanos que son sus principales clientes actuales. Eder ms adelante planea ampliar su negocio adquiriendo en calidad de arrendamiento el local contiguo, para diversificar su oferta y ampliar sus servicios. Eder se siente muy satisfecho con su actividad, pero tiene el gran desafo de la competencia a la que responde entregando a sus clientes un servicio de excelencia y adicionndole muy buenos precios. Mientras construye su sueo de incrementar su margen de utilidad, que en la actualidad es no menor del 35%, continua trabajando con mucho esmero y entusiasmado, con el crecimiento de su clientela. Este es el primer financiamiento que Eder hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con el comprar artculos de papelera, para responder a un contrato de suministros, que tiene con una organizacin gubernamental del municipio y con este nuevo ingreso, aumentara sus utilidades.
texts.en:
Eder is a young man of 25 who has a business called "E Internet" (And Internet) in the center of Puerto Colombia, a town which is located in the North-west of Atlntico department and borders with the Caribbean coast to the north. Eder is a graphic publicist and an electronic engineering student. Two years ago, he decided to give free reign to his entrepreneurial capacity by opening an Internet caf, with the aim of strengthening his personal income and achieving his goal of studying for a professional degree.
In his business, Eder offers telephone, fax, photocopying and Internet services. He also sells stationery products to his neighbors and to nearby schools who are his main customers. In the future, Eder plans to expand his business, renting the adjacent business premises so that he can diversify his offerings and expand his services.
Eder feels very satisfied with his business activity but he faces a great challenge from the competition to which he responds by providing his customers with an excellent service for very good prices. While he builds his dream of increasing his profit margin, which is currently no less than 35%, he continues working with a lot of care and enthusiasm as he grows his customer base.
This is Eder's first loan through Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo and he will use it to buy stationery products in order to respond to a supply contract that he has with a governmental organization in the town. With this new income, he will increase his profits.

loan.use: to buy stationery products

loan.name: Eduardo Rafael

texts.es: Eduardo es un hombre de 63 aos de edad, es casado, tiene 4 hijos en las edades de 25 a 38 aos y vive en el barrio Carrizal, comunidad alegre, solidaria y de gente trabajadora, que combina perfectamente la buena msica y las actividades microempresariales. All en este ambiente Eduardo se dedica a la fabricacin de calzado femenino e infantil, a la cual se dedica desde que tuvo 14 aos de edad, cuando fue ayudante de su padre, para finalmente aplicar toda su experiencia tcnica en el oficio de zapatera, en un negocio con el que ha logrado avanzar a su familia y al que le debe la totalidad de sus ingresos porque como l dice siempre ha tenido trabajo, gracias a Dios y no pasa necesidades En la actualidad est muy cerca a comprar la vivienda donde habita pues es arrendada y es en ella donde ha vivido con su familia desde que se cas. Su negocio ha avanzado mucho, especialmente por el cario y respecto con que trata a sus clientes, por eso la conserva, y es bien reconocido en el sector por ser una persona muy responsable en su vida personal y en su negocio. Con su credikiva que es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, comprar materiales e insumos para cumplir los compromisos adquiridos con sus clientes, pues ellos le han solicitado a Eduardo nuevos y modernos diseos, por lo cual su inversin ser exitosa. Su sueo es continuar trabajando para aumentar sus utilidades que estn en un margen no inferior al 25%, para muy pronto poder cumplir la meta de ser propietario de una vivienda.
texts.en:
Eduardo is a 63 year-old man who is married and has four children aged between 25 and 38. He lives in Carrizal neighborhood, a cheerful and supportive community full of hard-working people, which combines to perfection good music and microbusiness activities.
To be found in the middle of this environment is Eduardo who makes women's and children's footwear. He has been in this business since he was 14 years old when he worked as an assistant to his father. Eventually, he applied all of his technical experience to the footwear trade and started a business through which he has got his family ahead in life. It is to this business that he owes all of his income because, as he says, "I have always had work and, thanks to God, I don't want for anything". Eduardo is currently very close to being able to buy the rental home in which he has lived with his family since he was married.
Eduardo has made a lot of progress in his business, in particular due to the affection and respect with which he treats his customers. This is how he keeps his customers and he is well known in the trade as being a very responsible person both in his personal life and in his business dealings.
This Kiva loan is Eduardo's first from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo and he will use it to buy materials and supplies with which to fulfil his obligations to his customers as they have requested new and modern designs from him. For this reason, his investment will be successful.
Eduardo's dream is to continue working in order to increase his profits which have a margin of no less than 25%. He hopes that he will soon fulfil his goal of owning his own home.

loan.use: to buy materials and supplies for his shoe workshop

loan.name: Llanet

texts.es:
La seora Llanet es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Triunfadoras del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 38 aos de edad, es madre soltera y tiene 4 hijos. Se dedica a la venta de pescado, es rematista (compra de los botes para luego lo vende por tinas al por menor), la ganancia que obtiene le sirve para poder mantener a sus hijos. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprar medio bote de pescado para revenderlo. El mayor de sus hijos la acompaa porque hay das que tiene que madrugar y es peligroso salir a esas horas.
Tiene que trabajar para mantener a sus hijos y solventar los gastos de sus estudios. Agradece a Manuela por brindarle esa oportunidad y poder sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en: Llanet is a member of the Mujeres Triunfadoras (Triumphant Women) community bank in the district of Yarinacocha, department of Ucayali, Peru. She is a 38-year-old single mother with four children. She makes a living selling fish as a wholesaler, buying from the boats and then selling them to retailers. Her profits help her provide for her children. With the loan of 1,500 soles, Llanet plans to buy a half-boat's worth of fish to resell. Her eldest son accompanies her because there are days when she is up at dawn and it's dangerous to be out at that time. Llanet has to work to provide for her children and cover their education expenses. She is grateful to Kiva partner Manuela Ramos for giving her this opportunity so she can make headway for her family.

loan.use: to purchase fish wholesale.

loan.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis Alberto tiene 28 aos, Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar un terreno.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 28 years of age. He is married and lives with his wife and their children. He lives in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ros.
He is a member of the communal bank Seor de la Salud [Lord of Health], located in the Soloma precinct belonging to the Echeandia canton. This bank centers on agricultural work focusing on the short-growth-cycle crops of corn and rice. He earns his living growing corn and rice. He makes his purchases in Ventanas and sells his crops at the daily outdoor markets and especially on Sundays.
He is seeking the loan for buying seed, fertilizers and compost. The loan will supply him with the economic support he needs. He faces challenges such as pests and plant diseases in his crops and the variability of the weather. His dream is to purchase a plot of land.
He likes to play sports.

loan.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and compost.

loan.name: Dalis Marilyn

texts.es:
La seora Dalis es socia del banco comunal Las Gemas, del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 27 aos de edad, est casada y tiene una hija. Lleva 2 aos trabajando con los prstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de ropa y accesorios para damas. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprar: 12 blusas, 12 pantalones, 6 carteras, 6 shores, 12 polos para damas. Su esposo es electricista y para poder traer ms dinero a casa decidi invertir su dinero en la compra de ms mercadera, la mayor parte de la mercadera que trae es para repartir, ya tiene clientes fijos. Ella misma se encarga del reparto de su mercadera y lo hace en compaa de su pequea hija, porque no tiene con quien dejarla. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por seguir ayudando a las mujeres que tiene ganas de salir adelante.
En la foto se muestra junto a su hija.
texts.en: Dalis is a member of Las Gemas community bank in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali, Peru. She is 27 years old, married and has a daughter. She has been working with loans from Kiva partner Mauela Ramos for two years. Dalis makes a living selling women's clothing and accessories. With the loan of 1,200 soles, she plans to purchase 12 blouses, 12 pairs of pants, six handbags, six pairs of shorts and 12 women's polos. Her husband is an electrician and in order to bring in more money Dalis decided to invest her money in the purchase of more merchandise, the majority of which she brings in for deliveries, since she has regular customers. She delivers the goods herself, accompanied by her young daughter since she has no one to leave her with. Dalis is grateful to Manuela Ramos for continuing to help women who have a desire to succeed. She is with her daughter in the photo.

loan.use: to purchase women's clothing.

loan.name: Yuliana

texts.es: La seora Yuliana es socia del banco comunal Las Gemas, del Distrito de calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 20 aos de edad, est casada y teine 2 hijos. El tiempo que lleva perteneciendo a este banco comunal le ha servido para implementar su negocio de venta de comida, sta actividad la realiza los fines de semana. No tiene un puesto o local fijo, son para entregar en distintos sitios de la zonas. Con su nuevo prstamo de 2,300.00 nuevos soles comprar: 3 cientos de platos descartables, 3 cientos de taper descartables, 3 cientos de bolsas chequeras, 3 cientos de bolsas para aj. Para repartir tiene que contratar un motocar (moto) para poder cumplir con sus clientes y entregar la comida a la hora indicada. Est muy contenta con Manuela Ramos por la oportunidad que le da para poder trabajar y sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Yuliana is a member of the Communal Bank Las Gemas (The Gems) which is in the District of Calleria, Department of Ucayali. She is 20 years old, married, and has two children.

At the time she joined the Communal Bank, Yuliana wanted to expand her food business which she operates on the weekends. She does not have a stand or an established location, so she delivers food to different areas in the region.

With her new loan of 2300 PEN, Yuliana will buy 300 disposable plates, 300 disposable containers, 300 plastic bags, and 300 packets of pepper sauce. She would eventually like to have a motorcycle so that she can meet with her customers and deliver their food at the time she promised.

Yuliana is pleased to be given the opportunity from Manuela Ramos to work and help her family succeed.

loan.use: to purchase disposable plates, disposable containers, plastic bags, and packets of pepper sauce.

loan.name: Wilmer Wilfrido

texts.es:
Wilmer Wilfrido tiene 19 aos, Es soltero vive con los padres, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Wilmer se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar un terreno.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Wilmer Wilfrido is 19 years old, single, and lives with his parents. He resides in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ros Province.

The members of the Communal Bank Seor de La Salud (Lord of Health) meet in the neighborhood of Recinto Soloma, which is part of the canton of Echeandia. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Wilmer is a farmer who grows corn and rice. His purchases are made in Ventanas and he sells at the fairs every day, especially on Sundays.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially acquire the supplies he needs. Among the challenges he faces are pests, crop diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to buy a plot of land.

Wilmer enjoys playing sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loan.name: Luis Armando

texts.es:
Luis Armando tiene 25 aos, Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Luis se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar tres cuadras de terreno.
Le gusta hacer deporte todos los dias.
texts.en:
Luis Armando is 25 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children. He resides in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ros Province.

The members of the Communal Bank Seor de La Salud (Lord of Health) meet in the neighborhood of Recinto Soloma, which is part of the canton of Echeandia. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Luis is a farmer who grows corn and rice. His purchases are made in Ventanas and he sells at the fairs every day, especially on Sundays.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially acquire the supplies he needs. Among the challenges he faces are pests, crop diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to buy three plots of land.

Luis enjoys playing sports every day.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loan.name: Celia

texts.es: La seora Celia es socia del banco comunal Las Mariscalas II del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 37 aos de edad, est casada y tiene cuatro hijos menores. Lleva 3 aos trabajando con Manuela Ramos y tiene una bodega donde ofrece todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad. Su esposo es profesor en un colegio de la comunidad. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar un poco de abarrotes para surtir la bodega: 1 caja de aceite, 1 caja de leche, 1 paquete de avena, 5 kilos de harina, 1 bolsa de sal, 5 paquetes de papel higinico, 2 kilos de ajos, 1 saco de arroz, 1 saco de azcar, 1 caja de conservas. Estos productos son lo que la gente ms consume y no le debe faltar en su bodega, sus hijos la ayudan en la atencin. Agradece a Manuela Ramos por ayudar a todas las mujeres trabajadoras y especialmente a los de su banco comunal.
texts.en:
Celia is a member of the Communal Bank Las Mariscalas II which is in the District of Yarinacocha, Department of Ucayli. She is 37 years old, married, and has four young children.

Celia has been working with Manuela Ramos and manages a store where she offers all types of basic products. Her husband is a professor at the community college.

With her new loan of 1000 PEN, Celia will buy a few groceries to restock her store. This includes one case of oil, one case of milk, one packet of oatmeal, five kilos of flour, one bag of salt, five packets of toilet paper, two kilos of garlic, one sack of rice, one sack of sugar, and one case of preserves. These products are what people consume the most, but they are lacking in her store. Her children help her manage the business.

Celia is grateful to Manuela Ramos for helping all working women, especially those who are part of her Communal Bank.

loan.use: to purchase various products in bulk to restock her store.

loan.name: Aida Fabiola

texts.es:
Aida Fabiola tiene 33 aos, Es casada vive con el esposo y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Aida se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar una casa.
Le gusta lavar la ropa y cocinar.
texts.en:
Aida Fabiola is 33 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children. She resides in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ros Province.

The members of the Communal Bank Seor de La Salud (Lord of Health) meet in the neighborhood of Recinto Soloma, which is part of the canton of Echeandia. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Aida is a farmer who grows corn and rice. Her purchases are made in Ventanas and she sells at the fairs every day, especially on Sundays.

She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. The support from this loan will help her financially acquire the supplies she needs. Among the challenges she faces are pests, crop diseases, and changes in weather. Her dream is to buy a house.

Aida enjoys doing the laundry and cooking.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loan.name: Alejandrina

texts.es: La seora Alejandrina es socia del banco comunal Las Mariscalas del Distrito De Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 39 aos de edad, un hijo y est casada, su esposo se dedica a la agricultura. Ella se dedica a la venta bebidas gaseosas, cervezas y agua mineral, ella atiende su negocio personalmente, cada vez tiene ms clientes, mas aun los fines de semana que es cuando sale la gente de su chacra, donde trabajan toda la semana. Con su nuevo prstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprar 10 paquetes de gaseosa, 5 paquetes de agua mineral, 15 cajas de cerveza y 2 cientos de vasos descartables. Cuando termine ste ciclo desea solicitar una cantidad mayor para poder invertir en su negocio y hacer algunos arreglos que hace falta, pensando en la comodidad de sus clientes. Est muy agradecida con Manuela Ramos por permitirle hacer que su negocio siga creciendo.
texts.en:
Sra. Alejandrina is a member of the Communal Bank Las Mariscalas which is in the District of Yarinacocha, Department of Ucayali. She is 39 years old, married, and has one child. Her husband is a farmer.

Alejandrina sells sodas, beer, and mineral water. She personally attends to her business and has been able to attract more customers. Her business has more activity on the weekends since people leave the farms where they have worked the entire week.

Her new loan of 1000 PEN will be used to buy ten cases of sodas, five cases of mineral water, fifteen cases of beer, and two hundred disposable cups.

When she finishes this loan cycle, Alejandrina wants to request a larger amount so that she can invest in her business and make a few needed repairs which she believes will make her customers more comfortable. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for providing her with the opportunity to keep her business growing.

loan.use: to purchase sodas, mineral water, beer, and disposable cups in bulk.

loan.name: 30 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. 30 MAYO iniciar su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Senkata, est compuesta por ocho integrantes y est dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la seora Florencia. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociacin comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: kiosco de salchipapas, comercio diferente, hilado de lana de vicua, tienda de barrio, ayudante de albail, venta de tostado, venta de utensilios de limpieza, venta de ropa.
La seora Florencia indica que es la primera vez que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por medio de mis padres. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de mercadera en general, que viene trabajando hace dos aos atrs con la ayuda de su esposo, este oficio lo aprendi de su hermano mayor.
El crdito que ahora sacar es para comprar mercadera (compra de material en general, enlatados, embutidos, arroz, etc.), que consiguieran de diferentes lugares en el Desaguadero (frontera Per y Bolivia). Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella vive en unin libre y tiene cinco hijos.
Cuando se le consulta qu le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta capacitacin y salud.
texts.en:
The May 30th Communal Bank is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Senkata Community Center. This group consists of eight members and is led by a Board of Directors headed by Sra. Florencia. The members of this Communal Bank engage in various businesses such as operating a salchipapas (sausages and potatoes) kiosk, managing different retail outlets, making thread out of vicua wool, managing a neighborhood store, working as a masonry assistant, selling roasted foods, selling cleaning utensils, and selling clothes.

Sra. Florencia indicates that this is the first time she has worked with Pro Mujer. She joined the group because of her parents. At the moment, she has a business selling general merchandise. She began working two years ago with the help of her husband. Florencia learned this trade from her older brother.

The loan she is now receiving will be used to buy merchandise such as general materials, canned goods, cured meats, rice, and other products. She acquires her products in different places along El Desaguadero (the border between Peru and Bolivia). This method of working allows her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. She is in a common-law marriage and has five children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Florencia said she enjoys the training classes and the health services.

loan.use: to purchase general materials, canned goods, cured meats, rice, and other products.

loan.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 41 aos, Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Juan se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar un carro.
Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Juan is 41 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children. He resides in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ros Province.

The members of the Communal Bank Seor de La Salud (Lord of Health) meet in the neighborhood of Recinto Soloma, which is part of the canton of Echeandia. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Juan is a farmer who grows corn and rice. His purchases are made in Ventanas and he sells at the fairs every day, especially on Sundays.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially acquire the supplies he needs. Among the challenges he faces are pests, crop diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to buy an automobile.

Juan enjoys playing sports.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loan.name: Wilmer Reinaldo

texts.es:
Wilmer Reinaldo tiene 22 aos, Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Wilmer se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar un carro.
Le gusta caminar por el campo.
texts.en:
Wilmer Reinaldo is 22 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children. He resides in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ros Province.

The members of the Communal Bank Seor de La Salud (Lord of Health) meet in the neighborhood of Recinto Soloma, which is part of the canton of Echeandia. The members of this Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Wilmer is a farmer who grows corn and rice. His purchases are made in Ventanas and he sells at the fairs every day, especially on Sundays.

He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, and compost. The support from this loan will help him financially acquire the supplies he needs. Among the challenges he faces are pests, crop diseases, and changes in weather. His dream is to buy a car.

Wilmer enjoys walking through the fields.

loan.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and compost.

loan.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina es una joven D. 18 aos, muy dinmica que sabe hacia dnD. quiere ir. En la actualidad se dedica al comercio D. mercancas en miscelnea donD. expenD. variedad D. productos D. Juguetera, papelera, vajillas, vineras, perfumera, cosmticos bolsos, maletines, bateras D. cocina, sartenes, sanducheras , colchones inflables, cintas etc. ; adems D. vender en punto comercial, tambin comercializa mercancas por encargo ya que en compaa D. la abuela, viaja a Maicao, un municipio fronterizo, D. donD. la trae artculos D. la canasta familiar para venderla mediante pedidos; como es una mujer que conoce mucho su mercado, ofrece productos por catlogo especialmente en la lnea cosmtica y D. accesorios femeninos; En su miscelnea tiene 2 vitrinas horizontales, una vertical y una exhibidora D. mesa , adems D. estantes metlicos y repisas donD. muestra su mercanca con mucho estilo. Karina vive en casa familiar con su madre ta, abuela y conforma una familia con su cnyuge y una hija D. 8 meses, por quien se esmera en trabajar da a da con tal D. ofrecerle bienestar y las mejores posibilidades D. xito futuro. Aunque el negocio D. Karina existe hace ms D. 10 aos, perteneci a su abuela quien le enseo toda su experiencia y solo desD. hace 3 cuando su abuela enferm, est a su cargo; el 80% D. las ventas las realiza a crdito, mientras el 20% las realiza D. contado. Karina es una mujer muy emprendedora y productiva, tambin recibe otros ingresos correspondientes al dinero que gana como impulsadora D. ventas en una empresa; su cnyuge es su gran apoyo, trabaja tambin es empleado en una empresa y con l comparte todas sus metas. El negocio D. Karina presenta una buena autonoma financiera lo que le permite cubrir los pagos D. crdito, tiene 2 principales proveedores, con los que registra un experiencia D. 3 y 10 aos. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con el comprar mercanca en mayor volumen como vveres, ranchos, enlatados, para ganar descuentos y lograr mayor rentabilidad sobre sus ventas, que en la actualidad se encuentran en un porcentaje no mayor del 39 %.
texts.en:
Karina, age 18, is a dynamic young woman who knows where she wants to go. She currently manages a variety store where she sells a wiD. array of products such as toys, stationery, dishes, wine racks, perfumes, cosmetics, handbags, luggage, cookware, frying pans, sandwich makers, inflatable mattresses, ribbons, and other items. In addition to managing her store, Karina also sells goods by traveling with her grandmother to Maicao, a town along the border where she obtains household items that have been ordered by her customers. As a woman, Karina is very knowledgeable about her market. She offers products through catalogs, especially those promoting cosmetics and womens accessories. In her variety store, Karina has two horizontal display cabinets, a vertical display cabinet, and a showcase table. She also has metal racks and shelving where she can display her merchandise with style. Karina and her husband live at home with their eight-month-old daughter as well as with her mother, her aunt, and her grandmother. Each day she strives to proviD. for her daughters welfare and offer her the best chance at a successful future.

Karinas business has been in existence for more than 10 years. It belonged to her grandmother, who taught her everything she knows. Three years ago, her grandmother became ill and left her in charge. Eighty percent of her sales are maD. on credit, while the remaining twenty percent are cash transactions. She also earns additional income from commission she generates as a company sales representative. Her husband has been a great support since he also works as a sales representative and they share all of their goals together. Karinas business has a good income stream to cover her loan payments. She has two main suppliers who have been in business three years and ten years, respectively.

Her Kiva loan is the first she has received from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the money to buy merchandise in bulk such as provisions, snacks, and canned goods so that she can obtain discounts that will help her have more profitable sales. At the moment, she is able to achieve a maximum profit margin of 39%.

loan.use: to purchase provisions, snacks, and canned goods in bulk.

loan.name: Norma Estanislada

texts.es: Norma Estanislada tiene 64 aos, su actividad es una farmacia. Tiene ms de 15 aos en su negocio ha logrado mejorar su negocio con mucho esfuerzo. Ella inicio este medio de vida porque no hay mucha competencia con este tipo de actividad, es una persona trabajadora y ha aprendido muchas cosas con este negocio. el motivo del crdito es para la compra de medicamentos variados como jarabes, pastillas, vitaminas, descartables entre otros.
texts.en: Norma Estanislada is 64 years old, and she runs a pharmacy. She has been engaging in this activity for 15 years, and she has succeeded in improving it with great effort. She opened her pharmacy because there is not so much competition in this field. She is a very hardworking woman, and she has learnt many things through her activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy various medical items such as syrups, tablets, vitamins and dispensable syringes.

loan.use: To buy various medical items suche as syrups, tablest, vitamins and dispensable syringes.

loan.name: Segundo Manuel

texts.es:
Segundo Manuel tiene 44 aos, Es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Segundo se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar una finca.
Le gusta jugar boly.
texts.en:
Segundo Manuel is 44 years old, married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas canton of Los Ros province. The members of SEOR DE LA SALUD center live in Recinto Soloma, part of Echeandia canton. The center serves farmers of short season crops such as maize and rice.
Segundo farms maize and rice. He buys agricultural inputs in Ventanas and sells his products in the farmers market everyday, especially during the Sunday market. He is asking for a loan to buy seed and fertilizers. The loan will enable him to buy the agricultural inputs he needs.
