Segundo faces challenges such as crop pests and diseases and changes in the weather. His dream is to buy his own farm. In his free time, Segundo likes to play boly.

loan.use: To purchase seed and fertilizer.

loan.name: Lida Mercedes

texts.es:
Lida Mercedes tiene 28 aos, Es casada vive con el esposo y los hijos, vive en el Cantn Ventanas Provincia de los Ros.
Los miembros de la V.R.C. SEOR DE LA SALUD, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Soloma, perteneciente al Cantn Echeandia, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrcolas de ciclo corto siembra de maz y arroz
Lida Mercedes se dedica a la agricultura la siembra de maz y arroz, las compras las realiza en Ventanas y las vende en las ferias de todos los das en especial la de los domingos.
Solicita el crdito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes y abonos. Con el apoyo del crdito le ayudara econmicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafos como plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos y la variacin del clima. Su sueo es comprar un acasa para lo hijos.
Le gusta bailar en las fiestas del recinto.
texts.en:
Lida Merecedes is 28 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and children. She lives in the canton of Ventanas, in the province of De los Rios.
The members of the Seor de la Salud communal bank, located in Recinto Soloma, part of the cantn of Echeandia. This communal bank works in agriculture, planting corn and rice.
Lida Merecedes works in agriculture and plants corn and rice. She makes her purchases in Ventanas and sells them in the markets every day, especially the one on Sundays.
She is requesting the loan to buy seeds and fertilizers. With the support of this loan, she will be able to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as insect infestations and plant diseases in her plants, and also variable weather. Her dream is to buy a house for her children.
She likes to dance at the fiestas in her town.

loan.use: to buy seed and fertilizers.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loan.name: Delia Maria

texts.es: Delia Maria tiene 66 aos, su actividad es la venta de productos lcteos. Tiene ms de 24 aos con su negocio, inici con capital propio, fue con el paso del tiempo que logr ampliarlo fueron sus mismos vecinos quienes le sugirieron que empezara a vender leche, cuajada, crema, queso entre otros. Todos los das se levanta temprano para atender a sus clientes es una persona muy emprendedora. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de leche, crema, cuajada, queso y leche agria. Su meta es continuar organizando su negocio para aumentar sus ventas y tener mayor capital de trabajo con que responderle oportunamente a sus clientes.
texts.en: Delia Maria is 66 years old and she sells dairy products. She has been running her activity for more than 24 years. She started with her own capital and in time she succeeded in increasing it. Her own neighbors encouraged her to start selling milk, curd, cream, cheese and other products. She gets up very early every day to tend to her customers, as she is a very practical person. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy milk, cream, curd, cheese and filmjlk (similar to yoghurt but less sour). Her goal is to continue managing her shop in order to increase her sales and to have a wider selection of products to suitably satisfy her customers requests.

loan.use: To buy milk, cream, curd, cheese and filmjlk.

loan.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty de 25 aos, vive con su esposo Noe desde hace 5 aos. Ambos tienen 2 hijos Zara de 8 y Jess de 3 aos. Viven en su casa a medio construir, ubicada en la localidad de Tapo. Desde hace 4 aos siembra papa (tubrculo), maz y arveja; con la ayuda de su padre quien le ense a cultivar la tierra y todo lo necesario de la actividad agrcola. Con las ganancias de la comercializacin de los sacos de papa construy la mitad de su vivienda, por lo que espera que esta prxima cosecha sea ms productiva para ganar lo suficiente y concluir la otra mitad restante de su casa, para poder darles un hogar adecuado a sus hijos, quienes son el motivo que la impulsa para salir adelante en su sacrificada labor. Adems cuenta que hace muy poco comenz a trabajar como promotora de salud para el estado; detectando a los nios desnutridos de la localidad, recibiendo un dinero extra. Asimismo comparte sus actividades con la ganadera, cuidando de sus animales menores como: cerdos, burros y carneros, que luego de ensebarlos los llevan a comercializarlos en el mercado central de la ciudad. Betty en el futuro desea sembrar en mayor cantidad e independizarse, adems tiene planeado abrir una tienda de abarrotes que le ayude a obtener ms ingresos econmicos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Santa Cruz de Tapo, y este es el sptimo crdito con MFP, donde aprendido a ser responsable, por ello paga puntualmente sus cuotas. Betty, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de semilla de arvejas y varios sacos de abono orgnico, que le servirn para su prximo sembro.
texts.en:
Betty is 25 years old. She has lived with her husband, Noe, for 5 years. They have 2 children, Zara, 8 years old, and Jess, 3 years old. They live in a partially constructed house, located in the town of Tapo. For 4 years she has been planting potatoes, corn, and peas, with the help of her father, who taught her to cultivate the land and everything necessary for agricultural work. With the profits from selling the sacks of potatoes, she built half of her house. She hopes the next harvest will be more productive so she can earn enough to finish the remaining half of the house, so that she can provide an adequate home for her children; they are her motivation to get ahead in her hard work.
Also, she tells us that a short while ago she began working as a health promoter for the government. By identifying the undernourished children in the area, she earns a little extra money. She also raises small animals such as pigs, donkeys, and sheep. After fattening them up, she takes them to sell in the city's central market.
In the future, Betty hopes to plant a greater quantity of crops and become independent. She also plans to open a grocery store that will help her to increase her income. She belongs to the Santa Cruz de Tapo communal bank, and this is her seventh loan with Microfinanzas Primsa, where she learned to be responsible; she makes her repayments punctually. Betty will use the requested money to buy pea seeds and several sacks of organic fertilizer, which will help her when she plants her next crop.

loan.use: to buy pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To buy sheets, shorts, trousers, dresses, suits and also a great variety of shoes.

loan.name: Rayitos De Sol Group

texts.es: El grupo se llama RAYITO DE SOL y se encuentra ubicado en el estado de Morelos en Mxico. Este grupo se encuentra integrado por 8 personas, una de las integrantes del grupo es la seora CLAUDIA, tiene 27 aos de edad, es casada, tiene a sus 2 pequeos hijos de 10 y 5 aos quienes estudian primaria y knder, lleva 3 aos viviendo en la comunidad donde la mayora de sus habitantes se dedican a la agricultura. La seora Claudia se dedica a la venta de calzado y cosmticos desde hace 5 aos, ella solicita el prestamo para invertir en calzado y cosmeticos, ya que le hacen muchos pedidos y en ocasiones no tiene el suficiente dinero para comprar toda la mercancia que le piden, ella aprovecha las ofertas generando una mayor ganancia, permitindole el manejo de mejores precios a sus clientes ya que como ella tambien son madres trabajadoras y le gusta apoyarlas manejandoles pagos flexibles y comodos a sus posibilidades, con lo cual incrementa sus ventas y como resultado fortalece la economa familiar. Quiere ahorrar una parte de sus ganancias para la educacin de sus hijos y darles una mejor calidad de vida. La seora que aparece en la parte de atras de blusa blanca es conocida de las integrantes del grupo que quizo salir en la foto, por esta razn aparecen 9.
texts.en: The group is called Rayito de Sol [Sunbeam] and it is located in the state of Morelos in Mexico. This group is made up of 8 people. One of the members of the group is Claudia, who is 27 years old, married, and has 2 small children who are 10 and 5 years old and who are studying in primary school and kindergarten. She has been living in this community for 3 years, where most of the inhabitants work in agriculture. Claudia has been selling shoes and cosmetics for 5 years. She is requesting the loan to invest in shoes and cosmetics because people place many orders with her, and sometimes she doesnt have the money to buy the merchandise they request. She takes advantage of sales to generate greater profit. This allows her to give better prices to her clients who, like her, are hard-working mothers and she likes to help them out by extending them flexible and comfortable payments within their means. This increases her sales, and as a result, strengthens the economic situation of her family. She wants to save a portion of her earnings for her childrens education and give them a better quality of life. The lady who is in the back [of the photo] in a white blouse is a friend of the members of the group and she wanted to be in the photo, so that is why there are 9 people in it.

loan.use: to buy shoes and cosmetics for her business.

loan.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es: El seor Luis lvarez, es un pequeo productor del municipio de San Ignacio , desde hace veinte aos se dedica al cultivo de pia , la mayor afectacin que se le presenta son los gases del volcn ya que este quema las plantas , los planes hacia a un futuro es poder ampliar el cultivo ya que durante este tiempo con las ganancias obtenidas de la venta del producto a logrado mantener a su familia con muchas necesidades ya que son seis hijos , su esposa y el que conforman este hogar , necesita un financiamiento para la compra de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para recuperar las plantas de pia , para lograr un buen tamao , color y sabor ,ya que estas son las caractersticas para ser compradas en un buen precio .Agradece la confianza que le brinda Afodenic atrvez de los fondos Kiva para realizar la inversin .
texts.en: Mr. Luis A., is a small producer in the municipality of San Ignacio. For twenty years he has been devoted to growing pineapples. His biggest problem is the gases of the volcano since it burns the plants. There are plans in the future to expand the crop. During this time, Luis managed to support his family with many needs from the profits from product sales. His family is composed of six children and his wife. Luis needs a loan to buy fertilizers and agricultural inputs necessary to recover the pineapple plants, and also to achieve a good size, color and taste, as these are the features to sell them at a good price. Luis appreciates the confidence that gives Afodenic the capability for lending through Kiva funds.

loan.use: to purchase fertilizer and agricultural inputs.

loan.name: Maria Petronila

texts.es:
Maria tiene 28 aos de edad, ella cuenta con casa propia donde vive junto a su esposo, dicha vivienda est ubicada en una zona rural del distrito de Tcume, dicha vivienda cuenta con los servicios bsicos, lugar es una comunidad pequea con un aproximado de 50 familias.
Mara se dedica a la comercializacin de animales en especialmente el de aves como patos, pavos, gallinas, los cuales cra en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, esta actividad la realiza hace 5 aos es decir conoce a la perfeccin el rubro, durante este tiempo, ella realiza sus ventas en caseros cercanos a Tcume y tambin realiza entregas desde su domicilio. En todos estos aos Mara ha adquirido clientela fija para su negocio.
Maria est solicitando un prstamo de 700 nuevos soles para comprar animales y alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos adems adecuar corrales para una mejor crianza.
Mara es una persona emprendedora y responsable, ella desea poder crecer como empresaria y poder alcanzar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 28 years old. She owns her house where she lives with her husband. Said dwelling is located in a rural zone in Tcume District and has all basic utilities. The place is a small community made up of approximately 50 families.
Maria raises small farm animals to sell, especially fowl like ducks, turkeys and chickens, which she raises in corrals located in her back yard. Shes been in this business for five years, that is to say, she knows the work to perfection. During all this time shes made her sales in hamlets near Tcume and also sells at home and she has also acquired a fixed base of regular customers.
Maria is asking for a 700 new sol loan to buy animals and nutritionally balanced feed for their development. She will also equip additional corrals to better raise them.
Maria is an enterprising, responsible person. She wants to be able to grow as a businesswoman and attain a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy animals and their respective feed.

loan.name: Leydi Beatriz

texts.es: Leydi es la propietaria de una tienda naturista llamada Natural Verde en donde vende toda clase de medicina natural y adems presta el servicio de terapias fsicas y respiratorias en su consultorio ubicado en el mismo local, donde tiene todos los implementos necesarios para desempear esta actividad; Como fisioterapeuta profesional decidi desarrollar su espritu emprendedor una vez finaliz sus estudios en la Universidad en el ao 2005, ofreciendo servicios domiciliarios de las tcnicas aprendidas en su profesin y en la medida en que fue amplindose su cobertura de clientes, y apoyada por su novio experto en homeopata, abrieron su consultorio dotado de camillas, nebulizadores masajeadores y dems equipos, negocio que combin con un punto comercial donde vende productos naturales y que hoy hacen hoy de su sueo una realidad. Leydi necesita tener constantemente un inventario de mercancas alto, porque debe mantenerlo bien surtido especialmente de la mercanca que ms rota. Su sueo ms adelante es tener una institucin prestadora de servicios y convertirse en una distribuidora mayorista de sus productos. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con l comprar medicamentos naturales para hacerles crditos a clientes especiales, aumentar su capital de trabajo y continuar fortaleciendo su futuro, el cual planea sea exitoso.
texts.en:
Leydi is the owner of a health products store called Natural Verde (Natural Green) where she sells all types of natural medicines. She also has an office in the same location where she provides physical and respiratory services. Leydi has all the necessary tools to provide these services. As a professional physiotherapist, she decided to develop her entrepreneurial skills when she finished her studies at the university in 2005. She began offering home services to those who wanted to learn the techniques used in her profession. This gave her the chance to attract more customers. She has the support of her boyfriend, who is an expert in homeopathy, and they opened an office equipped with couches, nebulizers, massage devices, and other types of equipment. Combining this business with a store that sells natural products has allowed Leydi to turn her dream into a reality.

She needs to keep her inventory well-stocked, especially those products that have high turnover. Her dreams later on include having an organization where she lends her services and becoming a wholesale distributor of health products. This Kiva loan is the first she has received from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. She will use the money to buy natural medicines to use as rewards for her special customers, to increase her operating capital, and to continue building toward the future. Leydi plans to be successful.

loan.use: to purchase natural medicines in bulk.

loan.name: Nerida

texts.es: Nerida tiene 26 aos convive desde hace 2 aos con Juan Carlos. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Wilder y Andrea; con quienes viven en su tranquila y acogedora casa ubicada en la localidad de Tapo. Cada da es una lucha constante para ella ya que debe levantarse muy temprano porque tiene que alistar a su hijo para dejarlo en una cuna jardn donde pasa la mayor parte del da al cuidado de profesoras, y luego se dirige al mercado de su ciudad para abrir su puesto de venta de carne que tiene desde hace un ao, y que no puede descuidar ya que le genera ganancias diarias. Sola se encarga de su hijo, pues su esposo trabaja en Lima. Adems cuenta que desde hace 2 aos se dedica a la siembra de papa y habas, los cuales cuida los fines de semana con la ayuda de peones. Asimismo se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como chanchos y cuyes que enseba para luego venderlos en su puesto de trabajo. Por ver a su familia feliz, est pensando aumentar la cantidad de animales, para poder tener mayores ganancias y de esa manera invertir en la compra de terrenos agrcolas, ya que cada mes tiene que pagar una suma considerable por el uso de la tierra donde siembra. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Santa Cruz de Tapo, y este es el sptimo crdito con MFP, donde no defraudar la confianza depositada en ella, merece ser devuelta con mucho respeto. Nerida, invertir el crdito solicitado en la compra de semilla de papa canchay, asimismo en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgnico (guano de granja).
texts.en:
Nerida is 26 years old and has been living with Juan Carlos for two years. They live together with their two children, Wilder and Andrea, in their quiet cozy house in the village of Tapo. Every day is a constant struggle for Nerida; she has to get up very early to get her children ready to take to a kindergarten where they spend most of the day looked after by teachers, and then she goes to the city market to open her meat stall. She has had this stall for a year and she cannot neglect it as it generates profits daily.
She takes care of the children alone because her husband works in Lima. In addition, for the last two years she has been planting potatoes and beans, which she looks after on the weekend with the help of laborers. She also raises young animals such as pigs and guinea pigs, which she fattens up and then sells at her market stall. To make her family happy, she is thinking about increasing the number of animals in order to generate greater profits and thus invest in the purchase of agricultural land, as she currently has to pay a considerable monthly sum for the use of the land where she plants her potatoes and beans.
She belongs to the "Santa Cruz de Tapo" community bank and this is her seventh loan with Kiva Filed Partner, MFP. She will not disappoint the confidence placed in her, and thus deserves to be treated with great respect. Nerida will invest the requested loan in the purchase of "canchay" potato seeds, as well as several sacks of organic fertilizer (farm manure).

loan.use: to buy potato seeds and sacks of organic fertilizer.

loan.name: Jannette Jamilet

texts.es: Jannette Jamilet se dedica a brindar el servicio de taxi. Adems tiene su trabajo que es docente en una escuela. El negocio Jannette inicio por la necesidad de obtener un ingreso, pues actualmente con el salario que obtiene no es suficiente para cubrir los gastos de su hogar. Uno de sus mayores desafos es el gasto de la gasolina del taxi, ya que el precio de la gasolina es muy inestable. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de llantas, focos y mantenimiento al vehculo.
texts.en: On top of her regular job as a teacher in a school, Jannette Jamilet also works as a taxi driver. As her main wage is not enough to pay for her familys expenses, Jannette started this activity because she needed a second income. One of her main challenges is the cost of petrol for the taxi, because gas price varies a lot. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy tires and headlights, and to pay for the cars upkeep.

loan.use: To buy tires and headlights, and to pay for the cars upkeep

loan.name: Martha Del Socorro

texts.es: Martha tiene su actividad que es una pulpera. La mayora de sus clientes llegan a su vivienda a buscar los diferentes vveres que necesita. Ella tiene 8 aos con este negocio, por lo que ha podido obtener una gran experiencia al brindarles lo que ellos necesitan. El motivo del crdito que solicita es para la compra de granos bsicos, detergentes, pan, galletas, cremas, leche, fsforos, sopas y enlatados.
texts.en: Martha runs a corner shop. The majority of her customers come to her house to buy the different provisions they need. She has been running this activity for 8 years, so she has gained a great experience in offering her customers what they need. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy basic grains, detergents, bread, biscuits, creams, milk, matches, soups and canned food.

loan.use: To buy basic grains, detergents, bread, biscuits, creams, milk, matches, soups and canned food.

loan.name: Hilario

texts.es: Hilario, de 53 aos, esta casado con Enedina, ambos tiene 5 hijos, todos ellos menores de edad educados en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Pian. Su familia es su principal pilar para salir adelante. l es albail y todos los das trabaja para poder ayudar en los gastos diarios de la familia; mientras que su esposa Enedina se dedica a la ganadera, pero el momento ms importante para ellos es cuando se encuentran en el campo, donde siembran espinaca y gladiolos hace ya 40 aos. Viajar a la capital de su pas para vender sus productos y realizar su oficio de constructor de casas es lo que ms le gusta a Hilario, ya que puede comprar muchas cosas que no encuentra en su pueblo, es por ello que piensa poner una tienda de abarrotes, cuando aumente su capital. En adelante desea construir una casa en la capital para sus hijos, para que tengan un lugar donde se queden mientras estudian en la universidad. Agradecer a Dios por darle vitalidad y fuerzas para trabajar, ya que forma a su familia bajo esa doctrina. l pertenece al banco comunal Sarita Colonia, y este es el noveno crdito con MFP, donde espera obtener el pequeo crdito para realizar sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Hilario, invertir el crdito solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgnico y fertilizantes naturales para poder esparcir entre sus cultivos de flor de gladiolo que dentro de unos meses cosechar. Asimismo sobrar un poco para comenzar su cultivo de Flor de alhel.
texts.en: Hilario, 53, is married to Enedina. Together, they have 5 young children, whom they home-school in their own house in the community of Pian. His family is his main pillar of support. He is a builder and works everyday to help with the family's everyday expenses, while his wife Enedina takes care of livestock. Their best moments are when they meet together in the fields, where they have been growing spinach and gladiolas for the last 40 years. Working as a house builder and traveling to sell his goods in the country's capital, where he can buy many products that he cannot find in his village, are what Hilario likes doing most. For this reason, he has been thinking about opening a grocery story when he has more capital. In the future, he also wants to build a house in the capital for his children, so they can have somewhere to stay when they go to university. He thanks God for giving him the vitality and strength to work, a doctrine on which he has always relied in raising his family. He is a member of the "Sarita Colonia" community bank, and this is his ninth loan with MFP. He again promises to pay his installments on time, as with the previous loans he has received. He is glad to be part of the community bank because all its members are responsible and friendly people. Hilario will use the loan to buy sacks of organic manure and natural fertilizers to spread around his beds of gladiola, which will be harvested in a few months. If there is any money left, he will use it to begin growing oleanders.

loan.use: to buy sacks of organic manure and fertilizers.

loan.name: Cosme Bernabe

texts.es: Cosme Bernab tiene 40 aos, su actividad es la venta de queso. Tiene ms de 5 aos en su negocio y el ha logrado aprender con todos sus clientes lo importante que es mantener su calidad en los productos. El inicio por la necesidad de obtener una fuente de ingreso para su hogar, tiene 1 hijo de 16 aos a su cargo el se encarga de proporcionarle alimento, estudios y vestimenta. El motivo por el cual solicita este crdito es para la compra de queso en mayor cantidad, pues l tiene que salir en su camioneta a ofrecer sus productos.
texts.en: Cosme Bernab, 40, operates a cheese sales business. He has operated the business for more than 5 years and he has learned from his customers that quality counts. He started the business because he needed a source of income to support his family. He has a 16-year old son and feeding, clothing and educating a growing boy is an expensive proposition. Cosme will use the loan to buy wholesale supplies of cheese that he will carry from place to place in his truck to sell.

loan.use: to buy wholesale supplies of cheese for his cheese sales business.

loan.name: Ludis Antonio

texts.es: El seor Ludis Gutirrez, es un pequeo agricultor de la zona de Masaya, desde hace quince aos se dedica al cultivo de yuca, los planes futuros es poder diversificar el cultivo , la mayor afectacin que se le presenta son las plagas que invaden las matas de yucas , el necesita un financiamiento para poder comprar insumos necesarios para combatir las malezas , ya que es el recurso econmico con el que cuenta para poder subsistir con sus tres hijos los cuales estudian y apoyan con las actividades del hogar .Agradece el apoyo y la confianza que le brinda Afodenic atrvez de fondos Kiva para poder realizar la inversin y llegar a mejorar tanto el cultivo como productos de calidad .
texts.en: Sr. Ludis G. has a small farm in Masaya where he has grown yucca for the past fifteen years. In the future, he wants to plant other kinds of crops. His biggest challenge is the plant disease that destroys yucca. He will use this loan to buy the supplies he needs to fight the disease. The farm is his main source of income for supporting his family and educating his three children, so the loan is important to the welfare of all of them. He is grateful for Afodenic's support and trust. Kiva funds will help him make the investment he needs to improve the quality of his crop.

loan.use: Buy supplies for his farming business.

loan.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga, de 31 aos, convive con Pedro de 31 aos, ambos tuvieron 4 hijos menores a los cuales alimenta y educa en su casa propia ubicada en el pueblo de Duraznillo. Como es de costumbre todas las maanas sale a la ciudad a vender los gladiolos que ella misma siembra en un terreno alquilado; ya hace 10 aos se dedica a la agricultura, y ahora desea tener mayor capital para poder vender en varios puntos del pas. Ya que la ciudad de Tarma es conocida como la ciudad de la flores, donde se produce la mayor cantidad de flores que se distribuye por todo el interior del pas. Olga disfruta de su trabajo porque puede salir a varios lugares y no tiene que regatear sus flores ya que ella misma las vende de lugar en lugar. Pero en estos meses tiene planes de viajar a la capital para vender las flores que sembrar con el prstamo que obtenga. Proyectndose a los meses de octubre y noviembre; donde el precio de venta se incrementa, producto de la demanda que genera las festividades dentro del pas. Su buena disposicin en el trabajo la motiva para enfrentar con mucha tranquilidad los gastos del hogar y la educacin de sus menores hijos, donde invierte la mayor cantidad de sus ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Sarita Colonia, y este es el segundo crdito con MFP, donde est contenta por que tendr otra vez la oportunidad de lograr sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Olga, comprar con el dinero solicitado semillas de flor de gladio y alhel que sembrar dentro de estos meses, y para asegurar la buena produccin de sus cultivos invertir tambin en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgnico para distribuirlos consecutivamente.
texts.en:
Olga, aged 31, lives with Pedro, also 31, and they have 4 minor children to educate and provide for in their own home, located in the village of Duraznillo. As is customary, every morning she goes to the city to sell the gladiolas that she grows on rented land. For 10 years now Olga has been dedicated to agriculture, and she wants to increase her capital to be able to sell in various parts of the country. Tarma is known as the City of Flowers, and its crops are distributed throughout Peru.
Olga enjoys her work because she gets to travel to various places and she doesn't have to bargain over prices, since she herself sells her crops from place to place. In the future, she plans to travel to the capital to sell the flowers that she will sow with this loan, looking towards October and November, when flower prices will increase, due to demand generated by national holidays.
Olga's good disposition towards her work motivates her to confront with tranquility the expenses of the household and educating her minor children, where most of her earnings are invested. This is her 2nd loan through MFP, and she is quite content because it gives her another opportunity to reach her objectives. Once again, she commits herself to the payment schedule, as in her previous loan. In addition, Olga is grateful to be part of her communal bank, because all the members are responsible persons with strong solidarity.
With this loan, Olga will buy gladiola and anheli (a local favorite) flower seeds to sow during these months, and in order to assure good crop production, she will also buy various sacks of organic manure to distribute consecutively.

loan.use: to buy flower seeds to plant and organic manure to fertilize her flowers, which she herself will sell in various locales.

loan.name: Janett Del Socorro

texts.es: Janett del Socorro tiene 42 aos, su actividad es una pulpera. Tiene ms de 30 aos de experiencia en su actividad, es una persona que le gusta conversar con sus clientes y que ha demostrado ser una futura empresaria que ha sabido manejar sus ingresos. Inicio como una alternativa de empleo, pues ella no tena un empleo adems necesitaba ayudar a su familia y surgi esta alternativa. El crdito es para la compra de granos bsicos, detergentes, cremas para el pelo, pan y productos para el hogar.
texts.en: Janett del Socorro is 42 years old, and her business is a small general store. She has more than 30 years of experience with this work. She is a person who likes to have conversations with her customers. She has shown herself to be a businessperson with a future, who has managed her income wisely. She started the business as an alternative to a job, since she did not find work. She needed to help her family, and this alternative arose. The loan is to buy basic grains, detergents, hair creams, bread and household products.

loan.use: to buy basic grains, detergents, hair creams, bread and household products.

loan.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
Mara madre de familia de 47 aos de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 2 hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios bsicos, ubicado en el distrito de Olmos que peretenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Se caracteriza por ser una zona de mucha actividad agricola y ganadera.
Mara se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino (ovejas) desde hace varios aos, su corral donde se encuentran sus ovejas son apropiados y espaciosos estn en la parte posterior de su casa, a sus animales los cra con alimentos balanceados como con pastos naturales y una vez que tengan el peso y el tamao ptimo las ofrece en el mercado de Lambayeque y Chiclayo, con el dinero que va adquirir por sus ovejas podr atender las necesidades diarias de su hogar.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 600 nuevos soles para comprar alimentos y mejorar su corral de sus animales, asegurando un buen crecimiento y engorde de sus animales para ofrecerlos aun buen precio en el mercado, lo que permitir cubrir su crdito y brindarle a su familia un mejor nivel de vida. Mara es conocida en la zona por ser una mujer trabajadora, dispuesta ayudar a otros, pero quiere que su familia se supere en especial sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mara, 47, is a mother living with her husband and two children in her own house which does not have basic utilities located in Olmos District that belongs to Lambayeque Department. Its noted for being a zone with much farming and livestock raising activities.
Mara has raised sheep for several years. The corral her sheep are kept in is spacious and adequate and is in her back yard. She feeds her animals nutritionally balanced feed like natural grasses and once they reach optimal size and weight she sells them at the market in Lambayeque and Chiclayo. She will be able to attend to daily household needs with money earned from their sale.
She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 600 new sol loan to buy feed and to make some improvements to the corrals for her animals assuring their good growth and development so that she can ask for a good selling price at the market which will allow her to repay the loan and provide her family with a better standard of living.
Mara is well known in her zone for being a very hard working woman willing to help others but she wants her family to get ahead, especially her children.

loan.use: to buy nutritionally balanced animal feed and to make improvement to their corrals.

loan.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith es una mujer emprendedora de 40 aos, est casada con Marino de 40 aos, ambos tienen 5 hijos, pero viven solo con dos de ellos, Fiorela de 9 y Medaly de 3 aos, en su casa propia ubicada en el pueblo de Pian. Desde hace 3 aos se dedica a la venta de menestras, mchica y 7 semillas (harina tpica de la zona andina de Per, en donde se concentra gran cantidad de vitaminas). Como todos los das ella sale a vender sus productos en su tienda, ubicada en el centro del pueblo. Lo que ms le gusta su trabajo es la venta de estos productos porque le parece muy rentable, es por eso que decidi hace un ao llevar sus productos a la capital de su pas para poder vender; como mujer ambiciosa tambin cultiva cebada con su esposo, quien se dedica al cuidado de sus sembros; ayudndole cuando dispone de tiempo. Para el futuro est hermosa familia piensa incrementar su capital para poder aumentar sus ganancias y de esa manera brindarle una mejor vida a sus hijas, a las que quieren ver desarrolladas y con un nivel de educacin superior a ellos. Adems de invertir en la mejora de su pequea casita. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Sarita Colonia, y este es el dcimo crdito con MFP, donde espera tener el apoyo financiero para poder concretizar sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Judith, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de insumos para la realizacin de la harina que vende; asimismo comprar varios sacos de abono orgnico para sus sembros de cebada.
texts.en:
Judith is an entrepreneurial 40 year-old woman who is married to 40 year-old Marino. They have five children but only live with two of them: 9 year-old Fiorela and 3 year-old Medaly. They live in their own home, in the village of Pian.
For three years, Judith has been selling mixed veg, 'mchica' (roasted cornmeal) and seven grain (a typical flour from the Andean region of Peru which contains a lot of vitamins). Every day, she goes out to sell her products in her store which is located in the center of the village. What she most enjoys about her work is selling these products because it is very profitable. For this reason, one year ago she decided to take her products to the capital city to sell. As an ambitious woman, Judith also grows barley together with her husband who looks after the crops, helping him when she has time.
In the future, this beautiful family is thinking of increasing their capital so that they can increase their profits and thereby provide their daughters with a better life. They want to see their daughters progress and gain a university-level of education. Judith would also like to invest in making improvements to her small home.
Judith is a member of the "Sarita Colonia" community bank and this is her tenth loan from MFP, from whom she hopes to gain financial support so that she can achieve her goals. On her part, she pledges once again to make her repayments on time as she has with her previous loans. Judith enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible people who are very supportive of each other. She will invest the money she has requested in buying supplies for making the flour that she sells. She will also buy several sacks of organic fertilizer for her barley crop.

loan.use: to buy supplies for making flour and also sacks of fertilizer

loan.name: Vilma Elena

texts.es: Vilma Elena tiene 42 aos, su actividad es una pulpera. Tiene ms de 2 aos en su negocio. Inicio este medio de vida por la necesidad de obtener una fuente de ingreso para su familia, es una mujer muy luchadora y que est pendiente de lo que sus 2 hijos solicitan. El financiamiento es para la compra de granos bsicos, detergentes, pan, galletas, leche, agua embotellada. Suea con aumentar su negocio y tambin su inventario para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Vilma Elena is 42 years old and she has had a small store for more than two years. She started this business because she needed to have a source of income for her family. She is a very enterprising woman and watches out for what her two children need. This loan is for the purchase of basic grains, detergent, bread, cookies, milk and bottled water. She dreams of expanding her business and her inventory in order to improve her quality of life.

loan.use: to buy basic grains, detergent, bread, cookies, milk and bottled water.

loan.name: Patricia Elena

texts.es:
Patricia de 32 aos, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en Tongorrape que pertenece al distrito de Motupe, el mismo que se encuentra en el departamento de Lambayeque. Es una zona donde la actividad principal es la agricultura y ganadera.
Desde hace 3 aos Patricia se dedica a la preparacin y venta de dulces (tortas, bizcochuelos, etc), negocio que a colocado en su domicilio, ya que en la zona donde vive no hay negocios similares, tiene su propia clientela a pedido, con los ingresos que adquiere puede solventar sus obligaciones familiares.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1000 nuevos soles para la compra de ms insumos para seguir preparando sus dulces o postres y as podr ampliar su negocio, al incrementarse sus clientes, podr tener mayores ganancias donde podr pagar su crdito y tener una mejor calidad de vida. Patricia desea tener un negocio ms grande donde ofrezca todo tipo de postres y bocaditos para todo tipo de eventos y lo lograr con mucho esfuerzo y trabajo, permitiendole darle a sus hijos un mejor futuro en la vida.
texts.en:
Patricia, 32, lives with her husband and children in her own house which has water and electricity located in Tongorrape belonging to Motupe District which is found in Lambayeque Department. It is a zone whose main activity is farming and raising livestock.
For the last three years Patricia has been making sweets to sell (cakes, cookies, etc.) The business is home-based since there are no similar businesses in her area. She has her own clientele and sales are based on prior orders. Income she earns can be used to meet family obligations.
She has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to buy more ingredients to continue preparing her sweets or desserts so that the business will expand increasing her customers and profits so that she will be able to repay the loan and have a better quality of life.
Patricia wants to have a larger business offering all kinds of desserts and snacks for all kinds of events. She will attain this with much effort and work making it possible for her to provide her children with better futures.

loan.use: to buy ingredients to continue making her sweets and desserts.

loan.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen es una pequea comerciante, tiene su propio negocio, una pulpera en donde vende una variedad de productos, tambin palmea tortilla, pues as es que ha venido creciendo y aumentando su capital, teniendo el apoyo econmico de su esposo, el cual labora como cadete de taxi, y con el financiamiento ha logrado introducir ms ventas, en productos de consumo, ya que es lo que demanda la clientela. De sus tres hijos, uno es independiente, y los otros cursan el ao escolar. Como madre est feliz por poder dar a sus hijos una buena educacin. Con este nuevo prstamo invertir en compras de granos bsicos: quintales de arroz, azcar, maz, frijoles, bidn de aceite, cajas de jabn de lavar y de bao entre otros productos que satisfaga al cliente.
texts.en: Carmen is a small business woman who runs her own business, a pulpera [small grocery store] where she sells a variety of products. She also makes tortillas by hand. Her business has been growing and she has been increasing her capital. She has the economic support of her husband, who works as a taxi driver. With the help of previous loans, she has been able to increase sales of consumable goods, which is what her customers demand. Of her three children, one is independent and the others are enrolled in school. As a mother, she is happy to be able to give her children a good education. With this new loan, she will be able to buy staple items like rice, sugar, corn, beans, a drum of oil, boxes of soap for cleaning and bathing, and other products to satisfy her customers.

loan.use: to buy staple items like rice, beans, corn, and sugar, in order to improve her sales

loan.name: Carvir Orfelia

texts.es: Carvir Orfelia es una futura empresaria que tiene su negocio como es la venta de mueble. Tiene ms de 5 aos de experiencia con su actividad, ella tiene 1 hijo a su cargo que tambin le ayuda con el negocio Carvir tiene su negocio por el mercado en donde es muy concurrido por mucha gente, tiene que levantarse todos los das temprano para abrir su tienda. El motivo del crdito es para la entre otros ya que actualmente tiene demanda de parte de sus clientes.
texts.en: Carvir Orfelia is a future entrepreneur who has a furniture selling business and has more than five years experience in this area. She has one son who also helps her. Carvirs business is located in the market, where it is well known by many people. She rises early every morning to open her store. She will use to money from this loan to buy items to fill orders from her customers.

loan.use: to buy furniture for resale

loan.name: Malvy Luz

texts.es: Marly vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos en las edades de 21 a 27 aos de edad en el barrio Ciudadela 20 de Julio, lugar donde interactan actividades productivas del sector formal e informal, conjuntos residenciales, viviendas e infraestructuras recreativas y deportivas, como El estadio Metropolitano, sede del balompi profesional de Colombia donde juega e Junior de Barranquilla, equipo de futbol muy querido en la Costa Norte; en este ambiente mezclado Marly tiene una sala de belleza donde ofrece los servicios de manicure, pedicure, corte, blower y peinados dirigido a damas caballeros y nios, enfocada en el mejoramiento de su imagen personal y profesional y en los gustos y preferencias de los consumidores de sus servicios. Este negocio lo inici Marly desde que cumpli sus 18 aos de edad en las Islas de San Andrs donde aprendi todo lo relacionado con la belleza mediante un curso que hizo en el Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje Sena y posteriormente trabaj con una amiga donde lo perfeccion. En la actualidad est aplicando a su credikiva que es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprar productos de belleza, como champo, enjuagues, tintes, masajes, pinta uas en mayor volumen, pues cada da crecen sus clientes y requiere tener insumos en su negocio para responderle de la mejor manera y tambin para venderle una vez hayan recibido su asesora que es el valor agregado que ella en su saln de belleza ofrece. Su sueo ms adelante es comprar el local donde funciona para no seguir pagando arriendo, y mientras trabaja por su sueo continua esforzndose por aumentar su margen de utilidad que est en porcentaje no inferior al 25%.
texts.en:
Marly lives with her husband and three children, aged 21 to 27. They live in the Ciudadela 20 de Julio neighborhood, a place where the productive acitivities are in the formal and insector. There are residencial areas and housing, and recreational and sports infrastructure such as the Metropolitano Stadium, a Colombian professional soccer site. That is where Junior de Barranquilla plays, a much beloved soccer team on the Costa Norte. This mixed ambience is where Marly has a beauty parlor, where she offers manicures, pedicures, haircuts, blow-outs and styling for men, women and children. She is focused on improving her personal and professional image and on the tastes and preferences of the consumers of her services. Marly started when she turned 18 years old on the Islands of San Andrs, where she learned everything related to beauty in a course she took in the "Sena" National Learning Service. Later, she worked with a friend, where she perfected her technique. At present, she is using her Kiva loan, which is her first loan with the Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, to buy beauty products. She will buy shampoo, rinses, dyes, massages, and nail polish in greater volume. Every day she has more customers and she needs to have materials for her business to better respond to them and also to be able to sell to them once they have received her services. This is an added value her beauty parlor offers.
Her dream for the future is to buy the locale where she is so that she doesn't have to pay rent anymore. While she is working on her dream, she continues to strive to increase her profit margin, which is no less than 25%.

loan.use: to buy beauty products such as shampoo, rinses, dyes, massages, and nail polish in greater volumes.

loan.name: Santos Joel

texts.es:
Santos tiene 28 aos de edad, el es casado, tiene 02 hijos menores de edad, cuenta con casa propia la cuala est ubicada en el casero Valle Nuevo en el distrito de Mochumi a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo.
Santos se dedica a la comercializacin de animales menores, en variedad como aves gallinas, pavos, patos, los cuales cra en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio, este negocio lo desarrolla en el Mercado central o en los distintos caseros cercanos a Mochumi. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace mas de 6 aos, en los que a adquirido experiencia en el rubro y clientela fija a su negocio.
Santos est solicitando a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 2000 nuevos soles para el engorde de sus aves, con el prstamo comprara alimento para dichos animales adems podr adecuar corrales para tal fin.
Santos es una persona emprendedora y responsable, el desea poder crecer como empresario y poder brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Santos is 28 years old. He is married and has 2 minor children. He has his own house which is located in the settlement of Valle Nuevo in the Mochumi district, 45 minutes from the city of Chiclayo.
Santos earns a living through the sale of a variety of small animals like hens, turkeys and ducks. He breeds them in pens situated in the back of his home. He is building up this business in the central market or in the various settlements near Mochumi. He has been engaged in this activity for six years during which time he has acquired experience in the area and loyal customers for his business.
Santos is requesting a loan of 2000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa for the fattening of his fowl. With this loan he will buy feed for said animals as well as be able to improve pens to that end.
Santos is an enterprising and responsible person. He wants to be able to grow as an entrepreneur and be able to provide his family with a better quality of life.

loan.use: to buy animals and their respective feed.

loan.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita, D. 52 aos, est casada con Ral D. 60 aos ambos tienen 6 hijos. Pero solo viven con dos D. ellos en su casa propia ubicada en el pueblo D. Pian. Su vitalidad y fuerza incentiva a su familia a salir adelante, pues todos los das desD. muy temprano sale a vender menestras en el mercado central D. su comunidad D. Huasahuasi, donD. posee un pequeo puesto vendiendo en mayores cantidades los das sbados y domingo donD. existen ferias comerciales; segn afirma con el dinero que obtiene compra los alimentos del da, pero la actividad que ms le gusta a Felicita es la agricultura, ya que hace 25 aos se dedica a ello, sembrando, zanahoria y espinaca los cuales despus venD. en la capital del pas. Estar en el campo es lo que le agrada D. su trabajo, es tranquilo, afirma, es por ello que quiere ms adelante comprar su propio terreno para sembrar mayor cantidad D. verduras y poder tener mayor capital. A pesar D. su edad asegura estar contenta con su trabajo por lo que nunca dejara D. producir las tierras que la vieron nacer. Ella pertenece al banco comunal, Sarita Colonia, y este es el octavo crdito con MFP; donD. espera obtener al apoyo que tanto necesita para concretar sus objetivos D. xito. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Felicita, con el crdito solicitado comprar varios kilos D. menestras para su negocio; asimismo comprar varios sacos D. abono orgnico para distribuirlos en sus cultivos D. zanahoria,augurando una cosecha D. 60 sacos promedio.
texts.en: Felicita is 52 years old. She is married to Ral, who is 60. They have 6 children. They only live with two of them in their own home, located in the town of Pian. Her vitaility and strength motivates her family to get ahead. Every day she goes out to sell vegetable stews very early in the central market of the community of Huasahuasi. She has a small stall there where she sells in large quantities on Saturdays and Sundays where there are commercial fairs. She states that with the money she obtains she is able to pay for their food, but what Felicita likes the most is farming. She has done it for 25 years, planting carrots and spinach. She sells them in the country's capital. Being in the country is what she likes the most about her work; "it's calm", she affirms. That is why, in the future, she wants to buy her own land to plant more vegetables and to be able to have more capital. Despite her age, she assures us that she is happy with her work, because she will never stop seeing the land she was born in produce. She belongs to the Sarita Colonia community bank and this is her eighth loan with MFP. She hopes to get the support that she so needs to obtain her goals of success. On the other hand, she is one again committed to making her payments, as with the other loans she had. In addition, she likes to be part of her community bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. With the loan she has asked for, Felicita will buy various kilos of vegetable stew for her business. She will also buy several sacks of organic fertilizer to spread on her carrot crops, assuring a harvest of an average of 60 sacks.

loan.use: to buy vegetable stews as well as sacks of fertilizer.

loan.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Gilberto de 44 aos de edad, vive en su casa propia con su esposo e hijos, no cuenta con servicios bsicos, ubicada en la provincia Morropn que pertenece al departamento de Piura. Zona que desarrolla la actividad agrcola, ganadera y artesana.
Gilberto se dedica a la preparacin y venta de harina de maz que la utilizan para la elaboracin de chicha de jora, actividad que realiza desde algunos aos y lo ofrece a sus clientes que la conocen, de esta manera se ayuda a tener ms ingresos econmicos, permitiendole solventar sus gasto familiares.
Ha solicitado un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar maz para molerlo y volverlo harina para su comercializacin, lo que le permitir tener mayores ingresos, ya que su clientela se ha incrementado, para poder pagar su crdito adquirido y de paso mejora la calidad de vida de su familia. Gilberto desea que ms adelante su negocio crezca para seguir ayudando a su familia y brindarle mejores comodidades a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Gilberto, 44, lives in his own house with his wife and children. It does not have basic utilities and is located in Morropn Province belonging to Piura Department. Farming, raising livestock and crafts are typical activities in the zone.
Gilberto makes corn flour to sell thats used to make Chicha de Jora (corn based beverage). Hes been in business for several years and sells to customers that are aware of it. This way he helps himself have more income allowing him to meet family expenses.
He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan to buy corn to grind into flour to sell which will allow for more income because his clientele has grown, to repay the loan and at the same time improve his familys quality of life. Gilberto wants for later on that his business grows to continue helping his family and providing his children with more comfort.

loan.use: to buy corn to grind and sell as cornmeal.

loan.name: Pedro Pablo

texts.es: El seor Pedro O., es un pequeo agricultor de la zona de Masaya, desde hace veinte aos de se dedica al cultivo de yuca, la mayor dificultad que se le presenta son las plagas y enfermedades que afectan al cultivo, los planes futuros es poder ampliar mas la produccin y comprar un yunta de bueyes para arar las tierras, don Pedro tiene a su cargo tres hijos menores de edad que estudian ; su esposa labora en una empresa privada para a poyar con los gastos del hogar. El necesita el financiamiento para poder realizar las compras de fertilizantes e insumos y poder combatir las malezas. Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrvez de los fondo Kiva ya que si esto no fuese posible no podra sacar su cultivo a flote.
texts.en:
Pedro is a small farmer in the Masaya region where, for the last 20 years, he has cultivated maniac. The greatest difficulties he faces are the plagues and diseases that affect his crops. His future plan is to be able to expand production and buy a yoke of oxen for plowing the fields.
Pedro has responsibility for 3 minor children who are all in school. His wife works for a private enterprise in order to help with household expenses. This financing is necessary to purchase fertilizers and supplies, and to battle plant illnesses.
Pedro appreciates the help offered by Afodenic through the Kiva fund, since without this, it would not be possible to bring his crops to harvest.

loan.use: buy fertilizers and supplies for his maniac crops.

loan.name: Trabajando Para El Futuro Group

texts.es: La Sra. Mirian es divorciada, tiene 3 hijos, actualmente es integrante en la alcanca comunal Trabajando para el futuro grupo conformado por 8 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Mirian trabaja desD. hace 15 aos en la venta D. prendas D. vestir y a su vez tambin venD. productos D. belleza Avon y Esika este trabajo surge raz D. su divorcio y sus deseos D. salir adelante ya que se volvi padre y madre para sus hijos y la forma D. sacar adelante a sus hijos era trabajar muy duro , gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicacin sus hijos cuentan con educacin ha logrado mejores ingresos que le ha permitido construir su casa, y brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad D. vida, con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo prstamo para comprar prendas D. vestir ( Medias, pantalon, blusas, polo) y seguir vendiendo . Sabemos que Mirian cumplir sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Mirian is divorced with three children. She is currently a member of the "Trabajando Para el Futuro" [Working for the Future] village bank. There are eight members in the group, who work in a variety of businesses. For fifteen years Mirian has been selling clothing as well as Avon and Esika beauty products. She started out because she got divorced and she wanted to get ahead; she had become both mother and father to her children and the way to success was to work very hard.
Thanks to her effort and dedication, her children have an education and she managed to make more income which has allowed her to build her house and give her family a better quality of life. So she can continue growing, she's seeking a new loan to buy more clothing (stockings, pants, blouses, and polo shirts) to keep on selling. We know that Mirian will achieve her goals with lots of work and effort and that the loans from Edaprospo will help.

loan.use: to buy clothing.

loan.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto de 38 aos de edad, vive junto con su esposa en su casa propia, no cuenta con los servicios bsicos (agua, luz y desague ), ubicada en el distrito Mrrope que pertenece al departamento de Lambayeque. Esta zona se caracteriza porque los pobladores desarrollan la actividad agricola, ganadera y artesana .
Humberto se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios aos, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra chileno (es un tipo de frijol), producto que se consume mucho en los alimentos diarios de todos los pobladores, con los ingresos que obtendr con la venta de su chileno podr mejorar su calidad de vida.
Ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un prstamo de 3000 nuevos soles para la compra de fertilizantes y pesticidas para abonar sus tierras de cultivo y asegurarse de tener una muy buena produccin de chileno para poder pagar el prstamo brindado como incrmentar sus ingresos y darle lo que necesita a su esposa. Humberto es un hombre responsable y trabajador, todo el esfuerzo que demanda su trabajo es con la meta de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Humberto, 38, lives with his wife in his own house which does not have basic utilities (water, electricity and sewage) located in Mrrope District which belongs to Lambayeque Department. This zone is noted because its residents are farmers, raise livestock and are craftsmen.
Humberto has been farming for several years. He has his own fields where he grows chileno (a type of bean), a product that is consumed quite widely as part of local residents daily meals. Income from chileno sales will improve his quality of life.
He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 3000 new sol loan to buy fertilizer and pesticide for his crops to insure a good yield of chileno to be able to repay the loan and increase his income to give his wife everything she needs.
Humberto is a responsible, hard working man. All the effort his work demands is aimed at getting ahead.

loan.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide.

loan.name: Robert

texts.es: Robert, de 44 aos, es un hombre muy sencillo y trabajador, vive solo en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Picoy. El trabajo que realiza Robert es el cultivo de Manzanilla, esta actividad le ha dado los ingresos necesarios para mantenerse, es por eso que todos los das trabaja arduamente en sus sembros. l ha visto por conveniente llevar sus productos hasta la ciudad de Tarma, a una empresa de fabricacin de filtros a base de hierbas para las bebidas; segn manifiesta, es ah donde mejores ganancias obtiene. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden amenazar su productividad, lleva 5 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es transportar sus productos, ya que el camino es muy largo y agotador. Con el tiempo, espera que sus cultivos mejoren y con su venta pueda mejorar sus ingresos econmicos. Adems cuenta que; despus de cosechar la manzanilla que produce cada 4 meses, lo comercializa a la empresa de filtrantes, donde le pagan muy bien y cuyos ganancias los distribuye a los peones; Tengo que pagar a los peones que me ayudan a mantener mis sembros y los gastos de trasporte, asegura. l trabaja en el banco comunal Exaltacin Santa Cruz y este es el cuarto crdito con MFP, donde est muy contento de saber que recibir el apoyo para seguir con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Robert invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgnico para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de manzanilla.
texts.en:
Robert, 44 years old, is a very simple and hard-working man who lives alone in his own house, located in the locality of Picoy. He cultivates camomile. This activity has provided the necessary income for his maintenance. That is why he works hard very day in his fields.
Robert finds it convenient to transport his crops to the city of Tarma, to an enterprise that makes herbal teabags for drinks. According to Robert, this is where he can receive the most earnings.
What he likes most about his work is caring for his crops to avoid the plagues that can threaten productivity. Robert has been doing this for 5 years and he believes the most difficult part is to transport his produce, since the road is very long and rough.
In time, he hopes his crops will improve and their sales will increase his income. He says that after harvesting the camomile, which matures every 4 months, he sells the harvest to a teabag factory, where he is paid very well and whose earning are distributed to the farmers. I have to pay the workers who help me to maintain the plantings and the costs of transport, he asserts.
Robert works with the Exaltacion Santa Cruz communal bank. This is his 4th loan through MFP, and he is very content to know that he will receive help to continue with his business. He promises once again to comply with his payments, as he has with his previous loans. In addition, Robert is pleased to be a part of his communal bank because all its members are responsible persons with much solidarity.
Robert will invest his loan in the purchase of various sacks of organic manure to be spread among his plantings of camomile.

loan.use: buy sacks of organic manure to spread among his plantings of camonile.

loan.name: Angela

texts.es: ngela tiene 55 aos, su actividad es la venta de mercadera en general. Tiene ms de 10 aos de estar ofreciendo a sus clientes los productos que le solicitan. Uno de sus mayores desafos es el aumento de precio en los productos, ya que ella viaja hasta Managua para realizar las compras en donde los precios cambian. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de sabanas, mochilas, bolsos, calzado, cosmticos y ropa.
texts.en: ngela is 55 years old. Her activity is selling general merchandise. She has been offering her customers the products they ask for for more than 10 years. One of her biggest challenges is the price increase of the products. She travels to Managua to do the purchasing, and the prices there change. She reason for the loan is to buy sheets, backpacks, purses, shoes, cosmetics and clothes.

loan.use: to buy sheets, backpacks, purses, shoes, cosmetics and clothes.

loan.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es: La seora Mercedes, es agricultora de la zona de Ticuantepe, desde hace doce aos la mayor afectacin que se le presenta son las plagas que afectan al cultivo de pia, los planes futuros es poder mejor la conservacin del suelo ya que cuando hacen quemas este se deteriora hasta puede perder sus potenciales para la agricultura, ella necesita el financiamiento para realizar la compra de fertilizantes e insumos necesarios para inducir la plantacin. Agradece el apoyo que le brinda Afodenic atrvez de fondo Kiva ya que los intereses son bajos al igual que sus cuotas.
texts.en: Mercedes is a farmer in the area of Ticuantepe. For two years, the biggest problem has been the pests that the pineapple crop. The plans for the future are to improve soil conservation. When there is burning, it deteriorates to the point that it loses its farming potential. She needs the loan to buy the fertilizers and materials she needs to start the planting. She is grateful for the support that Afodenic has offered through the Kiva Fund, since the interest rates are low as well as the payments.

loan.use: to buy fertilizers and materials.

loan.name: Mercedes Vanessa

texts.es: Mercedes vive en el barrio San Jos al sur de la ciudad de Barranquilla; all tiene una sala de belleza y ofrece servicios de corte, peinado, blower, tinturado, manicure y pedicure. Su negocio naci hace dos aos cuando decidi generar ingresos para su hogar, una vez lleg A Barranquilla procedente de Cinaga Magdalena y estudi este arte. Su sala de belleza comenz pequea y poco a poco con su dedicacin ha logrado construir una buena clientela, que cada da aspira a extender. Este es el primer financiamiento que hace Mercedes a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con l comprar masajes, champo, enjuagues, tintes, y pinta uas para el consumo de su negocio y para venderle a sus clientes, pues ofrece asesora en tratamientos, como valor agregado y esto gusta mucho a sus clientes. Su mximo sueo y desafo es tener una casa propia, donde pueda adecuar una habitacin para su negocio y en la actualidad su capital de trabajo no le alcanza para responder a este propsito. Mientras Mercedes trabaja por alcanzar su sueo, continua manejando una rentabilidad sobre las ventas de un 30% que planea aumentar con el ejercicio persistente de su trabajo.
texts.en: Mercedes lives in the San Jos neighborhood in southern Barranquilla. There she has a beauty salon and offers haircuts, hairstyling, blow drying, dying, manicure, and pedicure services. Her business was born 2 years ago when she decided to generate income for her home, once she arrived to Barranquilla from Cinaga Magdalena and studied art. Her beauty salon started off very small, but little by little, with her dedication, she has managed to form a good clientele, which she hopes to expand every day. This is the first loan that Mercedes has had with the Fundacin Santo Domingo. She will use it to buy masage supplies, shampoo, conditioners, dyes, and nail polish for her business and to sell to her customers. She offers accessories to her treatments for an extra charge, and her customers like these a lot. Her biggest dream and challenge is to have her own home where she can have an adequate space for her business. Currently her working capital isnt enough for this. While Mercedes is working to reach her dream, she continues to make a profit of 30%. She plans to expand this with perseverance in her work.

loan.use: to buy massage supplies, shampoo, conditioners, dyes, and nail polish

loan.name: Lorena Del Pilar

texts.es: Lorena Del Pilar tiene 44 aos, su actividad es brindar el servicio de costura. Hace ms de 6 aos que tiene este negocio, ella inicio este negocio como un pasatiempo luego con el paso del tiempo fue que logro establecer su negocio. El motivo del crdito es para la compra de telas, tijeras, zipper, hilos, dedal entre otras herramientas necesarias para la elaboracin de sus diferentes prendas.
texts.en: Lorena Del Pilar is 44 and she has a sewing business. She has had this business for more than 6 years, and she started it as a hobby. As time passed, she established it as her business. She is requesting a loan to purchase fabric, scissors, zippers, thread, thimbles, and other tools that she needs to make her various garments.

loan.use: to buy fabric, scissors, zippers, thread, thimbles, and other tools.

loan.name: Francis Del Carmen

texts.es: la sra. trabaja arduamente como secretaria, es madre soltera de un nio el cual depende de ella actualmente y a la ves se encuentra en edad escolar. Ell visita nuevamente las oficinas de ceprodel para solicitar su segundo prstamo, el cual ser utilizado para compra de materiales de construccin como; perlines y hierro para la reparacin del techo de su casa de habitacin ya que este se encuentra detereorado y en invierno el agua se pasa. todo esto para darles un techo digno a su pequeo hijo.
texts.en: Francis works hard as a secretary. She is a single mother of one school-aged son who depends on her. She visited us at the Ceprodel offices to request a second loan, which will be used to buy construction materials like beams and iron to repair the roof on her home since it is deteriorating in the rainy season from all the water. This is so she can provide a worthy home to her young son.

loan.use: to buy construction materials.

loan.name: Florisa

texts.es: Florisa, D. 56 aos, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en la casa que le heredaron sus padres junto a su querida hija Marilyn D. 22 aos y su pap D. 82 aos; en la localidad D. Picoy. Los sembros D. Florisa son D. los mejores cuidados D. entre los agricultores D. la zona, ya que ella los cuida y trabaja con mucha paciencia y cario, los productos que cosecha, son la papa y la arveja, los cuales lleva a vender al mercado mayorista D. la ciudad D. Tarma, ya que es ah donD. mejores precios obtiene. Lo que ms le gusta D. su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras, lleva 31 aos realizando esta actividad y considera que lo ms difcil es fumigar sus chacras. Con el tiempo, espera comprar ms tierras, para incrementar su produccin. Adems prepara hamburguesa y anticuchos los das domingos en la ciudad D. Tarma, donD. obtiene buenas ganancias. Pero como est trabajadora mujer no descansa, en sus tiempos libres se dedica a la costura D. mandiles realizadas a base D. telas, el cual lo comercializa D. acuerdo a los pedidos que recibe D. parte D. los pobladores D. su localidad. Ahora est pesando sembrar en mayor cantidad, pero el alza que tuvo las semillas D. los productos agrcolas, la preocupa. Sin embargo espera obtener buenas ganancias. Florisa pertenece al banco comunal Exaltacin Santa Cruz y este es el dcimo crdito con MFP, donD. espera su colaboracin para concretar sus planes. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago D. sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte D. su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Florisa, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra D. 2 bolsas D. semilla D. arveja D. la variedad letrilla, asimismo en linsumos como baldes D. aceite para la realizacin D. la comida que venD..
texts.en: Florisa is 56 and is a very simple and hard-working woman. She lives in Picoy in a home that she inherited from her parents with her beloved daughter, Marilyn, 22, and her father, 82. Florisas fields are among the best cared for of all of the farmers of the area. She cares for them and works with a lot of patience and care. She grows potatoes and peas, which she sells at the wholesale market in the city of Tarma. This is where she can obtain the best prices. What she likes most about her job is sowing the land. She has done this work for 31 years, and the most difficult part is fumigating the land. With time, she hopes to buy more land and increase her production. She also prepares hamburgers and kebabs on Sundays in the city of Tarma, where she makes good profits. Since this hard-working woman doesnt rest, in her free time she sews items maD. out of fabric, which she sells based on orders she receives from people in her town. Now she plans to harvest large quantities, but the rise in seed prices worries her. Nevertheless, she hopes to make good profits. Florisa belongs to the communal bank, Exaltacin Santa Cruz, and this is her 10th loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, where she hopes for collaboration to finalize her plans. On the other hand, she promises once more to make her payments on time, like in previous loans she has had. She is also thankful to her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and very united. Florisa will invest the requested money in the purchase of 2 bags of pea seed of the letrilla variety and in supplies like buckets of cooking oil to make the food that she sells.

loan.use: to buy two bags of pea seeds and cooking oil.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: to buy chicken in pieces and to buy certain products for her small grocery store

loan.name: Segunda Santos

texts.es:
Segunda tiene 52 aos D. edad, ella es casada y vive en casa propia la cual est ubicada en un casero llamado Somate Alto en el distritote Sullana en el departamento D. Piura al norte D. Per, este es un casero mediano con deseos D. superacin.
Santos cuenta con una pequea bodega instalada en su domicilio la cual es atendida por ella misma, hace varios aos. All ofrece en venta a sus vecinos y clientes D. la zona diversos productos D. consumo diario, entre productos D. primera necesidad y abarrotes, haci como tambin bebidas, el negacin tiene buena cogida y en este tiempo a conseguido tener clientela fija.
Santos est solicitando un prstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1000 nuevos soles para poder invertir en su negocio, comprando ms mercadera y D. esta manera incrementar sus inventarios.
Santos es una mujer bastante trabajadora y D. muy buen carcter, las personas que le conocen le tienen mucha estima y cario.
texts.en:
Segunda, 52, is married living in her own house located in a Hamlet called Somate Alto in Sullana District in Piura Department in northern Peru. This is a medium sized hamlet wishing to improve.
Santos has a small home-based store that shes tended herself for several years. She offers her neighbors and customers in the area a variety of daily consumption products, among them basic need items and groceries, as well as beverages. The store is well received and she has managed to establish a regular clientele.
Santos is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a 1000 new sol loan to invest in the store buying more merchandise to expand inventory.
Santos is quite a hard working woman of very good character. People who know her hold her in high esteem and affection.

loan.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loan.name: Nancy Cristina

texts.es: La Sra. Nancy es una muy trabajadora que desde hace mas de ocho aos se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa usada , accesorios y zapatos, actualmente ella renta un local donde tiene gran variedad de productos para la venta, en esta ocasin ella utilizara el crdito para acondicionar su establecimiento para que as su clientela se sienta mas agusto cuando acuden a su local, agradece el apoyo brindado para la realizacin de su proyecto.
texts.en: Seora Nancy is very hard-working, and she has had a business buying and selling used clothing, accessories, and shoes, for more than 8 years. She rents in a location that has a large variety of products for sale. She will use this loan to fix up her location so her customers feel more at home when they arrive there. She is thankful for the support that is being offered her so she can carry out this project.

loan.use: To buy clothing to sell

loan.name: Teodolinda

texts.es: Teodolinda, de 38 aos, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Ronald de 44 aos y su hija Zulema de 18 aos, en el casero de Picoy. Desde muy joven comenz a trabajar para salir adelante. Su principal negocio es la venta de animales menores en su misma casa, es ah donde vende gallinas, patos y otros animales, los cuales estn bien alimentados y cuidados, es por eso que tiene muchos clientes y sus ingresos econmicos son buenos. Lo que ms le gusta de su trabajo es alimentar a sus aves, ya que los cra con mucho cario, lleva 18 aos en este negocio y considera que lo ms difcil es tener que sacrificar algunos de sus animales, para vender su carne a las carniceras de su localidad. Para el futuro, planea alquilar una tienda donde pueda brindar a sus clientes una mejor comodidad a la hora de atenderlos. Pero hace poco incursion en la venta de productos comestibles y de primera necesidad y aunque le falte abastecerlo con ms productos, le est dejando buenas ganancias. Adems cuenta que comenz a trabajar junto a su hija en la confeccin de buzos, donde piensa ms adelante invertir la mayor parte de su capital ya que tiene mayor campo de trabajo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal Exaltacin Santa Cruz, y este es el dcimo crdito con MFP; donde espera un pequeo prstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez ms a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crditos que tuvo. Adems le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Teodolinda, invertir el dinero solicitado en la compra de productos comestibles como: azcar, arroz, leche, atn y dems. Asimismo comprar tela para la confeccin de buzos.
texts.en:
Teodolina is 38 and is a very simple and hard-working woman. She lives in her own home in the town of Picoy with her husband Ronald, who is 44, and her daughter Sulema, who is 18. Since she was very young, she started working to get ahead. Her main business is selling small animals at her home. She sells chickens, ducks, and other animals who are well-fed and cared for. This is why she has many customers and her economic income is good. What she likes most about her job is feeding her birds, and she raises them with a lot of care. She has had this business for 18 years, and what she considers the most difficult is sacrificing some of her animals to sell the meat in butcher shops in her area.
In the future, she plans to rent a store where she can offer her customers more comfort. A little while ago, she invested in consumable goods and basic products, and she needs more money to increase her inventory. She is making good profit. She also tells us that she started working with her daughter to make sweaters where she plans to invest the majority of her capital . She belongs to the communal bank, Exaltacin Santa Cruz, and this is her 10th credit with Microfinanzas Prisma. She hopes this small loan will help her meet her objectives. On the other hand, she promises once more to make her payments on time, just like she has with her previous loans. She is also thankful to her communal bank because all of the members are responsible and united. Teodolinda will invest the requested money in the purchase of consumable goods like: sugar, rice, milk, tuna, etc. She also will buy fabric to make sweaters.

loan.use: to buy basic food products to supply her store and also to buy fabric.

loan.name: Vilu Maribeth

texts.es: Vilu Maribeth tiene 33 aos, esta mujer ha sido una gran madre para sus hijos ya que siempre ha brindado lo necesario adems todos los das les ensea valores importantes para que sean personas de bien. Ella se dedica a la venta de mercadera en general, desde hace mas de 10 aos que tiene este negocio, sus inicios fueron cuando tena la edad de 18 aos, a pesar de ser tan joven tena la experiencia necesaria para ofrecerles a sus clientes lo que ellos le solicitan. El crdito es para la compra de ropa, calzado, cosmticos, sabanas y tratamientos.
texts.en: Vilu Maribeth is 33 years of age.
